name: Tetris
description: Tetris for Fujitsu OASYS series word processors. It was featured in many brochures of compatible models.

name: Tetris
description: Tetris for the NEC Mini5.

name: Tetris
description: Tetris is a Windows port of the game included as part of the first Microsoft Windows Entertainment Pack, and later re-released as part of Microsoft's Best Of Windows Entertainment Pack.

name: Tetris for Windows CE
description: Tetris for Windows CE was a game released for various devices running Windows CE.

name: Tetris.com
description: Tetris.com was a handheld released in Japan. It featured an infrared sensor for multiplayer use and message function.

name: Nintendo Mini Classics: Tetris
description: Nintendo Mini Classics: Tetris is a keychain version of Tetris released only in Europe as part of the Nintendo Mini Classics line of toys.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.

name: Tetris
description: Tetris is a licensed Tetris game for Fifth-Generation iPods with software version 1.2 or later, available from iTunes Music Store. It is of note that this game breaks some of the Tetris Company's guidelines, the largest difference being the lack of a hold function.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 90: The Sensha
description: Featuring ten tanks from World War II, Mobile Armor is a mission-based shooter in which you control the "Mars army tank" in battle against a succession of "Earth army tanks." Completed missions in single-player story mode become available for two-player free mode, with one player manning the cannons and the other the tank, as well as for two-player VS mode. In VS mode, five tanks are available from cleared story mode missions, with another five added based on the number of cumulative defeated Earth army tanks.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 91: The Gambler - Honoo no Tobaku Densetsu
description: The Gambler - Honoo no Tobaku Densetsu is a gambling game in which the player takes the role of a young gambler that enters a casino where he wants to earn lots of money playing against other gamblers in different dice games.

name: Bad Monday Simulator
description: Battle against the fusion of Sans and Garfield - Sansfield! In this Undertale style battle simulator, you must quickly dodge attacks and use special moves and items to survive!

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 92: The Tozan RPG
description: The Tozan RPG is a classic RPG in which the player controls a group of adventurers that have to climb a mountain and defeat the monsters that will come in their way.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol.94: The Cameraman
description: The player controls a deformed little guy who's about to drop out of photography school due to his parents’ deaths, but is offered a test to graduate by the dean. You walk around taking pictures to gain points and more film. The stranger and more screwed up the image you take is, the more points you get. Some of the things you'll see are pretty sadistic and evil, but that's what makes this game so damn fun to play.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 96: The Yakyuu 2
description: The Yakyuu 2 is another baseball simulation game featuring players detailed data, and the player can design the team tactics, trade players, etc. The game features also a 2 players vs mode using a save of a team in the main game. The new features over the first Yakyuu game is that the graphic engine had been slightly improved and there are new stats and data.

name: Kamen Rider Ex-Aid x Chariso
description: Sin descripción

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 98: The Futsal
description: The Futsal is a futsal game in which the player can select between 8 different teams to compete and try to beat them. The game features also a 2 players vs mode.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 99: The Kendo - Ken no Hanamichi
description: The Kendo - Ken no Hanamichi is a kendo game in which the player can enjoy a great kendo simulation with a realistic IA in which the opponent uses a difficult defense tactic

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 100: The Astronaut
description: The Astronaut (Aka the Uchuuhikoushi) is a 3d action game that features a complete gravity simulation in which the player controls an astronaut in the future that have to complete several missions through the game in space stations or outside dangerous planets.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 103: The Ganso Densha Utenshi - Densha De Go!
description:
The player can choose from a variety of tracks and trains and will then have to drive the train to the designated stations while sticking to the tight schedule, stopping exactly at the marked positions, obeying all signs and signals, and ensuring passenger safety and comfort.

Whenever the player makes a mistake, points are deducted from a counter which at the start of each round is initialized to a value depending on the selected difficulty. If it reaches zero, the game is over.

This title features, among others, the Yamanote Line around Tokyo, and parts of the To-kaido- Main Line.

name: Bitsy Mystery Dungeon
description: This game is the result of a massive collaboration on the Bitsy Discord. 34 separate bitsyfolk each created a room. The project was built as an "exquisite corpse" - every room was constructed separately, and while variables were shared between participants to allow cross-room gameplay, the final layout of the maze was randomised.

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 01: Kidou Senshi Gundam - The Gunjin Shougi
description: Kidou Senshi Gundam - The Gunjin Shougi combines characters from the different Gundam series and the shogi (chess) game.

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 04: Jarinko Chie - The Hanafuda
description: Jarinko Chie - The Hanafuda is a hanafuda game based on the anime Jarinko Chie featuring a complete tutorial and a story and free modes.

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 05: Highschool Kimengumi - The Table Hockey
description: This Playstation game is a Table Hockey game that features characters from the manga Highschool Kimengumi. The player can choose (at first time) from one of the 5 main characters and have to defeat different characters in the story mode to unlock the gallery mode. The gameplay the player that reach 7 goals first win the match or have more goals than the other at the end of the time. There are also special attacks and special items to active them.

name: Spider-Man
description: The Game Boy Advance version of the Spider-Man movie tie-in.

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 06: Dokonjou Gaeru - The Mahjong
description: Dokonjou Gaeru - The Mahjong is a mahjong game based on the manga series Dokonjou Gaeru and featuring a complete tutorial and a story and free modes.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man
description: The Nintendo DS port of The Amazing Spider-Man.

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 07: Ikkyuu-san - The Quiz
description: Ikkyuu-san: The Quiz features a lot of different quiz questions about the Ikkyuu-san anime series, the game can be played against another human player or against the computer. The game features different game modes all of them quiz based.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man
description: The port of The Amazing Spider-Man for smartphone devices.

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 09: Tsuri Kichi Sanpei - The Tsuri
description: Tsuri Kichi Sanpei - The Tsuri is a fishing game based on the anime Tsuri Kichi Sanpei, the gameplay is in first person perspective, the game features different fishing spots.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man
description: The Nintendo 3DS port of The Amazing Spider-Man.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man
description: The port of The Amazing Spider-Man for J2ME based platforms.

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 12: Kidou Butou-den G Gundam - The Battle
description:
Kidou Butou-den G Gundam is a 2d fighting game that features characters from the G Gundam series and these game modes:

- Street
- VS CPU
- VS 2 Player

name: The Amazing Spider-Man
description: The Wii port of The Amazing Spider-Man.

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 13: Kidou Senki Gundam W - The Battle
description: Kidou Senki Gundam W - The Battle is a 2d fighting game that features characters from the W Gundam series.

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 14: Nante Tantei Idol - The Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Nante Tantei Idol: The Jigsaw Puzzle is a big collection of unlockable pictures and different images of the characters of the manga series "Nante Tantei Idol" that can be unlocked playing different jigsaw puzzle games.

name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 16: Ganba no Bouken Puzzle
description: Simple Characters 2000 Series vol.16: Ganba no Bouken Puzzle is an action puzzle game featuring characters from the anime series Ganba no Boken. The gameplay is about put the counter that is in botton right part of the screen to zero, in some stages that means destroy mouses, cats, birds or find all the items.

name: Pokémon: Towering Legends
description: Stack the biggest pile of the same element you can to get the highest combo possible. The round ends when all elemental tiles have been removed.

name: Cute Train
description: A simple puzzle where you have to guide a little cute train to the end of the line!

name: Ben 10: Power Splash
description: Your mission is to prevent Jonah Melville from stealing the Krakken's eggs and to rescue the bound and gagged Gwen. Avoid all of the enemies on the screen or kill them and avoid getting hit by the bombs the Jonah throws at you as Stinkfly.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
description: The Android and iOS port of The Amazing Spider-Man 2.

name: Portal for the C64
description: Portal is an adaptation of the 2010 Valve puzzle-platform game of the same name. It was changed from first-person into a fixed-screen side view, but the main concept is identical. It consists of twenty chambers in the Aperture Science Enrichment Center the character Chell needs to complete by using blue and orange portals to solve puzzles. She is controlled through the keyboard while a mouse or a joystick is used to aim the portals and launch them. Portals allow her to get past hazards or to trick turrets. Next to launching portals and movement Chell is able to jump, and carry and drop objects such as the companion cube. Between chambers the A.I. construct called GlaDOS often appears.

name: Nick Extreme Sports
description: A cancelled Nickelodeon game for the HyperScan.

name: Marshie's Malloween Mix-Up
description: This Halloween game was released at the same time as Malloween Commercial, and a week prior to 3 Times Halloween Funjob. It is similar to the game Ikaruga in that the player must master two different "colors" (in this case black and orange). To do so, the player must collect marshmallows of the same color as Marshie's current aura while simultaneously avoiding marshmallows of the other color.

name: Quake: DM4 Jam
description: The pack features 22 maps (including a start hub) recreating or reinterpreting the theme and style of the original DM4- The Bad Place.

name: Quake: Unused Jam
description: Community map pack with 12 level and start map using unused id textures from timfixed.wad. It comes with two custom skyboxes and a music track. The map sources are included.

name: After the Fall
description:
Total conversion featuring "18 new levels, 112 new models, 100's of new sounds, over 400 new textures, max size progs.dat", and other custom stuff - pretty much everything replaced.
The new textures, enemies, and sounds are very strange. This is only for hardcore people or those who want to try something radically different.

name: Into the Haze
description: Rescue a young girl from the clutches of an ancient demon in Into the Haze. Guide your character through a supernatural adventure, where she’ll encounter an ancient fog demon summoned by her sister-in-law in a magic ritual gone wrong. Race to rescue the heroine’s daughter, Emily, before the demon claims her prize.

name: Touhou Kouma Meikyuu: Adventures of Reimu
description: A Touhou Doujin game based on Adventures of lolo series, developed by Banshee Software.

name: Virtua Fighter 3tb
description: An updated port of Virtua Fighter 3, released in Japanese arcades in September 1997 and the Sega Dreamcast in November 1998. It adds a new "team battle" game mode, which allows players to choose three characters instead of one.

name: Rouge the Bat in Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A ROM hack/mod for Sonic the Hedgehog which changes Sonic for Rouge the Bat. The new character has new abilities such as the glide and an aerial downward attack.

name: (Another) Shadow the Hedgehog in Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A ROM hack/mod for Sonic the Hedgehog which changes Sonic for Shadow the Hedgehog. Although a previous mod with the same purpose exists, this one adds new abilities like the Light Dash and removes the Homing Attack.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: OmoChao Edition
description:
Sonic the Hedgehog OmoChao Edition is a ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog (16-bit) by Cinossu.

Originally starting as a joke between himself and Qjimbo, later on becoming a joke hack as an idea for April Fools, with the addition of OmoChao it became a challenge-based (and playable) hack, where the objective is to collect, destroy or even touch as little as possible.

name: Sonic Boom
description: Sonic Boom is a total modification of Sonic 2, created by snkenjoi and iojnekns, along with a wide array of talented contributors. As of the Seventh Annual Hacking Contest, this collective is referred to as SÆGA.

name: Yuuwaku Office Ren'ai-ka
description: In the vein of Tokimeki Memorial, the game follows the protagonist's love affairs inside an average Japanese company.

name: Sonic 2 Retro Remix
description: Sonic 2 Retro Remix is a large-scale ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 for the Sega Mega Drive, created by Thorn and DNXDelta. The goal of the project is to create a 2D Sonic the Hedgehog game that requires exploration to progress, as well as the requisite platforming and sheer speed. A mission system akin to those of the 3D Super Mario games is implemented as the means of progressing from one level to the next. Missions involve earning Chaos Emeralds in scavenger hunts, boss battles, speed runs and score attacks; most require learning each level's ins and outs, instead of just finding the easiest way to the goal.

name: Starry Sky: in Autumn
description:
The third of the four Starry Sky games starring the characters from the drama CD's of the same name.

Starry Sky takes place at Seigatsu Gakuen, a school which specializes in horoscopes, astronomy and other related topics. The main characters are all based on horoscopes.

Starry Sky Autumn features Kotarou Hoshizuki (Libra), Naoshi Haruki (Leo) and Iku Mizushima (Gemini).

name: Super Monkey Ball Gaiden
description: Super Monkey Ball Gaiden is a level pack for Super Monkey Ball 2 created by Cutsman. The pack would be critically acclaimed, with Cutsman becoming a level designer for the game Rolled Out! as a result. Super Monkey Ball Gaiden is best known for having extremely tough and long levels, and only a handful of people have beaten the Master difficulty.

name: Starry Sky: in Autumn Portable
description: Starry Sky: in Autumn Portable is a port of Starry Sky: in Autumn.

name: Starry Sky: in Autumn 3D
description: Starry Sky: in Autumn 3D is a port of Starry Sky: in Autumn.

name: Starry Sky: After Autumn
description: Starry Sky: After Autumn is a sequel to Starry Sky: In Autumn, continuing after the normal ending in the original game.

name: Starry Sky: After Autumn Portable
description: Starry Sky: After Autumn Portable is a port of Starry Sky: After Autumn for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Whyville
description: Whyville is an educational Internet site geared towards children from ages 8–14+ founded and managed by Numedeon, Inc. Whyville engages its users in learning about a broad range of topics, including science, business, art and geography. Whyville's users (Whyvillians) engage in virtual world simulation based games and role play sponsored by a wide range of governmental, non-profit, and corporate entities. In 2009, the website had a registered base of more than 7 million users.

name: GoPets
description:
GoPets was a virtual pet site that involved raising a customized three-dimensional pet downloaded onto a user's computer. GoPets was launched on August 4, 2005 and closed on November 8, 2009.

GoPets resided not only on their owners' computers, but also visited GoPets members around the world when sent, invited or when pets decide to travel on their own.

name: Meine Liebe: Yuubinaru Kioku
description: Meine Liebe: Yuubinaru Kioku is a otome game for PlayStation 2.

name: Meine Liebe II: Hokori to Seigi to Ai
description: Sin descripción

name: OS:Memories
description: You were just the owner of an office, but something piqued your curiousity. Understand what happened to Andyby browsing through his most personal archives and memories. OS:Memories is a short and engaging storyline about the everyday life of a game developer.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 1: The Table Board
description: Simple 2000 Series Vol.001 - The Table Board that features different games: Mahjong, Igo, Go, Reversi, Hanafuda, card games, etc. The game also features another mode in which the player controls the boy that have to rescue the girl from a fantasy kindgom playing all the different games through the game (mahjongs, igo, go, reversi, hanafudas, etc) in the different places of that kingdom.

name: Bleakstead
description:
You wake up on a bus at it's last stop, a small desert town called Bleakstead.

Explore, talk to the residents, perform magical rituals, read ancient runes, to discover the secrets hidden in this strange town.

name: Hyper Attraction Sky Games
description: A PS VR dedicated game that allows you to easily experience sky sports such as paragliding, bungee jumping and hang gliding.

name: Field
description:
Nothing is after you.
Nothing will jump out at you.
There are no sudden loud noises.

That doesn't mean everything is okay.

name: Hollow Park
description: A short first-person horror-action game/aesthetic experience.

name: TypeRush
description: TypeRush brings typing racers together! Compete against other talented typists around the globe.

name: The House That Dripped Blood
description: Blood. Blood. Suffering.

name: Suffer
description: Do you have any regrets?

name: Pocket Racers
description: Pocket Racers features miniaturised cars whizzing around a series of everyday environments. The player is cast as a spoilt teenager at a party, who is transformed into a toy car by of a vengeful demon. What follows is a frenetic race for survival as the 'Nemesis' demon sets a series of increasingly hard challenges within the fully interactive and destroyable!

name: Quake: Travail
description: Large-scale Quake mission with 15 SP levels (including a start map and two secret maps), custom textures, new monsters, items, and additional deathmatch maps.

name: Die, A.I
description: You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle space adventure. Survive the vengeful A.I system that has taken over the ship and killed everyone else onboard. Use your limited oxygen supply and cunning to overcome the failing systems and A.I created booby traps. Explore the ship...and don't die.

name: Oil Tycoon
description: Build an oil mining empire, and become a petroleum miner tycoon

name: Videogame Heardle
description:
A clone of Heardle and Joywave Heardle but for Videogame songs. Just name the game the song comes from to win.

Each Videogame Heardle has been hand-picked from all the screengames I know (loads).

name: Zelda Heardle
description:
A daily Zelda music guessing game!

Each Zelda Heardle is randomly chosen from Zelda soundtracks.

name: Chaos Wizard
description:
press x to invoke your sigil
pay attention to the rival wizard's spells

name: Chern
description: Action with RPG elements from beginners of the game industry, Gamega Games studios.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol.017: The Suiri Aratanaru 20 ni Jikenbo
description:
Simple 2000 Series Vol.017: The Suiri Aratanaru 20 no Jikenbo is the Sequel to Simple 1500 Series Vol. 59: The Suiri, this detective graphical adventure is part of D3's budget Simple 2000 line.

The gameplay is exactly the same as the first game: Player becomes a detective that have to unravel the mystery of incidents and each story adventure game. The game is divided into 20 episodes. Play time is 5 to 15 minutes for each story. The gameplay is collects the tips by clicking on the screen and after that answer the questions. The bigger differences between this game and the previous one are the best resolution graphics and the character voice acting.

name: Fallen London: Codename - Sugarplum
description: Codename: Sugarplum is an add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. Codename: Sugarplum was originally the Exceptional Story for June, 2022.

name: Towa no Sakura
description: Towa no Sakura is a otome game for PlayStation 2.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 21: The Bishoujo Simulation RPG - Moonlight Tale
description: The Bishoujou Simulation RPG is a Strategy game, developed by Yuki and published by D3 Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Liar! Office Deception
description: Liar! Office Deception is a spin-off otome game of Liar! Uncover the Truth by Voltage Inc. You are told that ten co-workers will be a trustworthy partner for you, but nine of them are liars, so you have to figure who's the liar and who's your trustworthy partner.

name: Liar! Scheming Socialites
description: Liar! Scheming Socialites is the second spin-off otome game of Liar! Uncover the Truth by Voltage Inc.

name: 125 Monkey Games
description: 125 monkey games for your monkey enjoyment. Gather speed on the Monkey Ramp then press Space to open the Monkey Wings in the air. Monkey Glide to catch bananas and land on a high scoring target!

name: Cow Evolution
description: In Cow Evolution, you evolve cows to get even bigger cows. The game combines elements of strategy, simulation, and incremental clicker mechanics. Starting with a humble cow, players breed and evolve their livestock through successive generations, unlocking new species and mutations along the way.

name: Crossy Creeper
description: An endless runner where you play with characters from many popular franchises

name: Lofi Hip Hop Worlds to Study in
description:
Welcome to a bunch of chill 3D worlds full of unique study spots with Lofi Hip Hop music and ASMR sounds. You can explore them to relax while you take a break from studying.

When it's time to study again, you can set a timer and put these worlds in the background. Nothing is trying to hurt you. You don't need to fight anything to win. You set your own goals, and you can customize your own soundscape to help you meet them.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 27: The Pro Yakyuu - 2003 Pennant Race
description: The Pro Yakyuu: 2003 Pennant Race is a Sports game, developed by Tamsoft and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Gumball: School House Rush
description: School House Rush is a 2D side-scrolling platform game that takes place in the The Amazing World of Gumball universe.

name: Red Hell
description: Red Hell is a single level kazio hack of Super Mario World made for the 2010 Kaizo Level Design Contest.

name: Ape Escape
description:
Experience Ape Escape originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Hunt down hundreds of cheeky chimps in the original Ape Escape adventure and collect loads of cool gadgets and tools, including a slingshot, monkey-net, sky-flying propeller, radio-controlled car, and monkey radar. Enjoy over 20 levels of madcap mayhem plus bonus mini-games including ski racing and Monkey Boxing.

name: What Makes Us Special
description: What do you need to start a school newspaper? The team of course! Nobody is perfect. Everyone is different.

name: Art School Pocket
description:
Art, that world full of scoundrels.
But how does one become an artist? Is it enough to be a face and rich parents?... almost. That will be valid for some chosen people but the rest of the really talented people need to study and prove that they are artists with a degree.

Put yourself in the non-exciting role of an art school student and get your diploma alone and exclusively using your creative skills.

name: In the World Unknown
description:
This is a game about a person who is lost and is trying to find his path...

In the World Unknown, tries to connect the player and sound together while showing the beauty of the world with the power of light...

The player wakes up in a strange dream world and is trying to figure out the place he is at, and where ever he goes a light follows him, helping him to see the beauty of the world, a strange sound is calling the player towards itself...

While going through the world, the player remembers his life and he finds peace in this present moment, He understands that the beauty he is trying to find all his life outside is actually inside of him and then he finally goes into the light...

name: Dog's Muck Island
description: Dog's Muck Island is a short Gameboy game inspired by Link's Awakening's fetch quest. Play in your browser or on a real Gameboy or Analogue Pocket.

name: Pokémon Grape
description:
A ROM hack based on Pokémon Red.
Despite using Pokemon Red as the base, the story is different and unique. it takes place in 1999. You have to impersonate a baseball player who has to participate in a competition. The winner of this competition will end up owning the Pokemon League. By the way, this will also avoid a war between the Frejo and Kelgo Regions, whatever that means. You have to build up your team of Pokemon before the competition begins to save the day. On top of that, former members of Team Rocket from Kanto have made it their mission to give you hell.

name: Sam Mallard: The Case of the Missing Swan
description: "Sam Mallard: The Case of the Missing Swan" is a short film noir adventure on the go with 15 different locations to explore and a fantastic 8-bit Jazz noir sound-track.

name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe + Super Mario Party Double Pack
description: Target Exclusive Double Pack includes both Mario Kart 8 Deluxe and Super Mario Party for Nintendo Switch.

name: King God Castle
description:
- Your luck will decide which hero you will strengthen
and which weapon will appear.
To use what is given efficiently to defeat enemies is
strategy and tactics!
Fostering and combining my own heroes!
- Choose the 6 most strategic heroes. Gold coins and
jewels from the battle.
Use them to strengthen your heroes and bring out your
potential.
Strengthening heroes through the power of the gods!
- Strengthen the altar to enlist the help of the gods. It's
the only thing that's gonna make the heroes the
strongest.
Choose an altar and gain divine power.
Enemies of various characteristics!
- Enemies using various characteristics and skills
invade. I don't know if I'm gonna use magic to wipe it
out.
It's up to you to take it down step by step.
I adjust the difficulty of my enemies. Challenge!
- You can use the challenge system to strengthen your
enemies and earn more rewards.

name: Pokémon: Ultra Violet Version
description: Pokémon Ultra Violet Version is a hack of the GameBoy Advance game Pokemon Fire Red Version. This new game has been altered in many ways to make the game more enjoyable, but it still has the same general design and story as the original Nintendo release.

name: Misfortune Advance
description: A Game Boy Advance port of the fan game of the creepypasta "Misfortune.GB."

name: Friday Night Funk'n: Funkin' is Magic
description: Friday Night Funk': Funkin' is Magic is a My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic themed mod for Friday Night Funkin'. The mod features eight songs, with three being included in the main week, one available in freeplay, and the other four being available as additional DLC.

name: Pokémon Gold and Silver 97: Reforged
description: Gold and Silver 97: Reforged is a totally new re-imagining of the world from the 1997 Spaceworld demo of Pokémon Gold and Silver. Featuring an entirely new campaign and story through the Nihon Region based on all of Japan. Graphics have been totally overhauled to match the look and feel of the final 1999 release of Pokémon GSC, and gameplay spruced up with lots of entirely new content and places to explore.

name: A Dance of Fire and Ice - Neo Cosmos
description: Neo Cosmos is an expansion to A Dance of Fire and Ice: It features 5 new worlds, all-new surprise game mechanics, and music by Canblaster 2k6, Frums, Ash Astral, and DM Dokuro.

name: Roboholic
description: Roboholic is a roguelite FPS with wacky physics and even wackier abilities. An ex-farmer turned robot is resurrected over and over again in order to defeat a crazed warlord leading an army of genetically modified soldiers and malfunctioning droids.

name: Sakura Succubus Bundle
description: Sakura Succubus is a lewd visual novel about amassing a harem of sexy succubi. Featuring a cute idol, a domineering businesswoman, and a spacey social media star, there’s no shortage of women to woo!

name: Friday Night Funkin': V.S. Neco-Arc
description: A mod about the funkiest funny cat in the entire great cats village!

name: Star Battalion
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Speedorz
description: A racing game with the characters from LEGO Chima

name: Invizimals: Hidden Challenges
description: Collect the official Invizimals TCG cards, trade them, and fight against your friends. By scanning the codes on the back of the cards, you can add them to your digital collection and interact with them in Augmented Reality.

name: RoboCop 2D 2: RoboCop vs. Terminator
description: Robocop is trapped by Skynet in a timesphere device, then reboots seconds later in the rubble of Los Angeles 2029!

name: Digimon Kari and Gatomon
description: Sin descripción

name: Digimon Davis and Veemon
description: Sin descripción

name: Digimon T.K. and Patamon
description: Sin descripción

name: Family Feud Cartridge #1
description: Sin descripción

name: Family Feud Cartridge #2
description: Sin descripción

name: Old Skies
description: A time travel adventure spanning two hundred years! Dive into the past with time agent Fia Quinn as she embarks on seven trips through time. History is up for grabs, from the speakeasies of Prohibition to the vicious gangs of the Gilded Age to the World Trade Center on September 10, 2001.

name: Astro Battlers TD
description: Kids land on a promising planet but so did dangerous furballs! Who wins? Astro Battlers TD is an up-and-coming roguelite deck building Lane Defense game with permanent and trap upgrades, level builder, dynamic defender, ultimates and challenges! Become an Astro Battler!

name: Voltaire: The Vegan Vampire
description: An action-farming-roguelite, full of whimsical flora and mischievous creatures that really want to ruin your dark and mysterious plans of… Going vegan!

name: Frogger
description: A third Frogger handheld LCD port. This one has the shape of the main character.

name: Herodes
description: It's 2197, and humanity faces a mysterious disease that cannot be cured by any treatment already known. There's only one option left: brute force. You must enter the body of Pacient Zero, find the source of the disease and destroy it before it is too late.

name: I Was Lost
description: Move walls, avoid danger in a labyrinthic poem, and create your own stories in this unique puzzle experience where each level is a poem's verse unraveling as you progress. Control not only your position but also move walls to create new paths and escape from seemingly impossible situations.

name: Down Fall
description: Down Fall is a battle royal where only the zone can kill you. Use weapons to damage and knock other players out of the zone. Multiple procedural generated levels give you the opportunity to stay safe at the top or venture down for better items and more risk.

name: Cheaphaven
description: Cheaphaven features a brief respite full of farming, building and upgrading, a small town of NPCs for all your chatting and shopping needs, and vaguely humorous descriptions for everyday items. Day/night cycle, market values, a pigeon, all the things that are supposed to be in a farming game

name: Farwoods
description: A world of storybook roleplaying inspired by works like Redwall and Ironclaw. Join a player-driven living world of fantasy and adventure, contribute to the player-run economy, and help contribute to the organic narratives created by the community.

name: Hands of Necromancy
description: Hands of Necromancy is a Dark Fantasy First Person Shooter and metroidvania game, similar to Heretic, made with the GZDoom engine. Find your weapons, fight evil forces, use the special abilities of special transformations to find your path! Show how powerful you are as a Necromancer!

name: Nodes
description: Node production simulator. Purchase nodes to produce resources, so you can advance in the technology tree and build yourself a large production line. This game will satisfy your need for incremental simulators with the large amount of content.

name: Let's Cook Together 2
description: Let's Cook Together 2 is a plot-driven co-op game. Use teamwork to fight against Nutri Inc. - a dystopian food government. Cook and serve dishes like the future depended on it. Travel across the world to make cooking meaningful again. Take back the taste.

name: Moonscape
description:
Moonscape is a resource strategy management DeFi game that takes place on a futuristic moon. Players scramble for limited resources to develop their burgeoning cities.

In the quest for domination, players can plunder rival cities and collaborate with friendly ones. City-building uses tried-and-tested DeFi mechanics, some employing the use of NFTs.

name: Pipoclub
description: In Pipoclub you will find the most successful children's educational games, created for children from all over the world. The games are available in Online version, downloads, Apps or physical support. Free games can be used without registration.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Imperial Edition
description:
Buy Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Imperial Edition and get:

Loyalist Pack: Purge heresy in style with these 4 unique class outfits, 8 weapon skin patterns, one set of headgear as well as an Ogryn body tattoo.
Mortis Veteran Portrait Frame: A cosmetic portrait frame used to pay tribute to the fallen defenders of Tertium Hive.
Caducades Backpack: A cosmetic backpack for human characters. Scavenged from the fallen troops of Cadia, this backpack has been repurposed to serve those still alive and fighting.
2500 Aquilas (premium currency)

name: Warhammer 40,000: Warpforge
description: A free-to-play digital collectible card game set in the 41st millennium, Warpforge will bring together all the major factions of the Warhammer 40,000 universe as digital cards for players to collect and do battle with in brutal and fast-paced skirmishes.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 29: The Renai Board Game Seishun 18 Radio
description: The Renai Board Game Seishun 18 Radio: Youth 18 Radio is a board game that also incorporates slight adventure aspects and high-production anime movies with the completion of each scenario.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun
description: Load up your Boltgun and unleash the awesome Space Marine arsenal to blast your way through an explosion of sprites, pixels and blood in a perfect blend of Warhammer 40,000, frenetic gameplay and the stylish visuals of 90’s retro shooters.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader
description: You will take on the role of a Rogue Trader, a scion of an ancient dynasty of daring privateers, that reign over their own merchant empire and explore the fringes of Imperial space with the blessing of the Emperor Himself. Thanks to their Warrant of Trade - the Rogue Trader is endowed with privileges and power beyond imagination as well as the task of expanding the borders of the Imperium. At their disposal is a gargantuan voidship of immense power and innumerable servants and personnel ready to do the bidding of their lord. Their adventures begin in the vast Koronus Expanse - a treacherous region of unexplored space at the edge of Humanity’s domain.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 34: The Renai Horror Adventure - Hyouryuu Shoujo
description: The Renai Horror Adventure - Hyouryuu Shoujo: It's a summer night and school shouldn't be where you're at but there you are with five lovely classmates. It's a group study session but an strange occurrence plunges the school underground and traps you and cohorts inside the storied halls of learning. Use the resources of your classmates and your own knowledge to find a way out of the school and return to your plain-Jane life.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 36: The Musume-Ikusei Simulation - Otousan to Issho
description: The future of your daughter depends on how you raise her.

name: Mitsu x Mitsu Drops: Love x Love Honey Life
description: Based on the manga, with new original characters.

name: World Fighting
description: World Fighting is a 3D versus fighting game offering several diffrent fighting styles from around the world. Thai boxing meets kung fu meets karate meets wrestling in four different "fighting arenas" actually being regular boxing rings with varying colours. Ten different fighters with individual and unique characteristics can be selected for a versus match against a friend, the tournament or a survival match. There also exists a training mode to exercise techniques and moves before entering true fights.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 44: The Hajimete no RPG - Densetsu no Keishousha
description: The region of Lordenias has seen a peaceful era for the last 400 years thanks to a single hero. However, this time was coming to an end. The king of Magura who controls the south-east island "Sylvania" was fascinated by demons and planned to revive the god of evil. Demons began to appear all over the island and soon the people began to disappear. The demonic forces turn their gaze towards Mid Earth. You will play as the protagonist and go on an adventure to save the world that has fallen. Travel around the world listening to people and gathering information. Around 100 kinds of monster, 50 kinds of magic, and 40 kinds of weapons and protective gear are available in this game

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 45: The Koi to Namida to, Tsukioku to... - Thread Colors Sayonara no Mukougawa
description: The game takes place primarily at the hospital and the local high school where the girls drift in and out of the player's daily life. During the hospital stay, our hero befriends a girl who tends to be sickly and naïve to the ways of the world but perhaps the two will help each other recover from their respective ailments.

name: Death Connection Portable
description: Death Connection Portable is a port of Death Connection for PlayStation Portable.

name: Sokocat: Combo
description:
Sokocat – Combo, brings two games from the series, Sokocat Islands and Sokocat Dungeon, a puzzle game that requires the player to push stone blocks to the correct position to reach the end of the level.

Sokocat Islands brings a tropical themed adventure; solve minimalist puzzles while listening to the sea and a relaxing soundtrack. Sokocat Dungeon, in the other hand, brings a mysterious adventure, Kitten Jone (the cat) now has to find artifacts in the dungeons of a castle.

Enjoy the Islands, avoid the traps in the Dungeon and keep pushing the blocks to the right spot to succeed. Hope this cat has 9 lives.

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Immortal Empires
description: Immortal Empires is a grand-scale campaign mode for Total War: WARHAMMER III available for free to owners of all three Total War: WARHAMMER titles. It combines the landmasses, Legendary Lords, war units, and more from the series into one colossal mode spread across the vast Warhammer World

name: QUByte Classics: Jim Power - The Lost Dimension by Piko
description:
QUByte Classics: Jim Power: The Lost Dimension by Piko is a classic action-adventure platformer that brings the special agent Jim Power, to save our planet from the supernatural alien, Vaprak.

His forces are too strong, a direct attack would not be effective and that’s why Jim Power has to slip through the defenses and attempt to stop this threat. It’s up to the player to reach Vaprak’s fortress and send him back from where he came.

Upgrade your weapons, jump carefully through the platforms, eliminate the enemies and reach the peak of your skills to save the planet in two Jim Power games, the 8Bit version and the 16-Bit!

name: Pac 'n Roll Remix
description: In Pac'N Roll Remix, the inhabitants of Pac-World have been turned into spheres by the evil monster Golvis' Ghost Light. Pac-Man must roll his way through Ghost-Land, collecting pellets and confronting Ghosts to save his family and restore peace to Pac-Land. Introducing an innovative new control scheme, Pac'N Roll lets players control Pac-Man with the Nintendo DS stylus. Players can roll and dash around the environment as well as execute maneuvers such as hairpin turns, immediate stops and precision rolling with effortless strokes of the stylus. In his quest to save Pac-Land, Pac-Man will venture through stages such as Castle Pac, Gyro-Jungle and the Ghost House, while facing perilous hazards like moving floors, dash panels, jump zones and wind zones. Along the way, Pac-Man will find power-ups like the Winged Chocolate, allowing him to fly through the worlds and jump over Ghosts, or the "Knight Chocolate," providing him with armor which grants him the power to crash through walls and withstand more damage.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Battlesector - Sisters of Battle
description: With its own distinct unique gameplay mechanics and flavour and plenty new units, the Adepta Sororitas are included as a fully fleshed out playable faction.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr
description: Sin descripción

name: Pac-Motos
description: The player controls Pac-Man and must knock all of the enemies off of the stage in order to complete the level, much like the original Motos. The player must traverse through five different worlds, each comprised of seven stages. The seventh stage features a boss piloted by either member of the Ghost Gang and must be defeated in order to proceed to the next world.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus
description: At the heart of Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus lies a richly detailed tactical game, played out as intense fast-paced skirmishes in PVE campaigns and tightly competitive PVP battles, as well as massively collaborative guild boss fights. With a deep and ever-expanding story penned by renowned Warhammer writer Matt Forbeck, Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus will tell stories across factions, as players build and customize their armies with epic and legendary units from the Ultramarines, Necrons, Adepta Sororitas, Black Legion, and many more to be revealed. Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus has something for every type of player.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 56: The Survival Game
description: The Survival Game is an Action game, developed by Best Media and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 58: The Gekai
description: The Gekai is an Adventure game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 59: The Uchuujin to Hanasou! Uchuujin-tte Naani?
description: The Uchuujin to Hanashi Sou! is an Action game, developed by Taito Corporation and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 69: The Board Game Collection
description: The Board Game Collection: Originally released as European Game Collection, this game is a collection of 5 different board games: Midnight Party, Geister, Zirkus Flohcati, Cartagena & Ursuppe.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 71: The Fantasy Renai Adventure - Kanojo no Densetsu, Boku no Sekiban
description: Swashbuckler adventure and real-world another dimension world your PC is connecting. Use skillfully laptops, and back and forth real world, along with the girls of five Erabareshi, to defeat the "demon stone mask" while a dangerous adventure and sometimes tears, and then, there is laughter. At the end of the perilous journey, Kimi wonder will be with anyone of the girls of five and are tied?

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 73: The Saiyuki Saruden
description: The Saiyuki Saruden: Based on the legendary Monkey series, this game requires you to protect the priestess Tripitaka from maurading demons with help of course from Pigsy, Sandy and Dragon. Genki awaits the appearance of the fractions demons from the seminal series with bated breath.

name: Ripple no Tamago: Apprentice Magician
description: The Oujisama to Romance - Ripple no Tamago: Step into the persona of an up 'n coming sorceress named Crim who has been tasked with conjuring a cure to reawaken a sleeping prince who has been cursed with a spell. Along the way, interact and contact with fellow mages.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol.75: The Tokudane - Nippon Zenkoku Scoop Rettou
description: The Tokudane is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Tomcat System and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 76: The Hanasou Eigo no Tabi
description: The Hanasou Eigo no Tabi is an educational quiz game in which the player is a japanese tourist (there is the choice to be a boy or a girl at the beginning of the game) that travels to the United States for the first time. In the game the player is supposed to stay for a week in a certain town, in which he will have to communicate in English with the town people and that will deep the friendship while puzzled about cross-cultural questions and memories.

name: Beauty Rental Shop
description: Beauty Rental Shop follows a MC who is a witch and begins to use potions to alter her appearance and become beautiful. The game is divided into three components – tapping game, dress up and visual novel.

name: Flower Boy Athletic High
description: Flower Boy Athletic High is a mobile game developed by Day7.

name: Pinocchia no Miru Yume
description: You can choose between a male and female protagonist, and play as a doll/puppet maker who's about to starve to death on Chirstmas Eve due to the inability to make a "pinocchia", a doll that looks and acts like a real human being (but isn't truly alive), and make enough money to feed yourself. As you slip into unconsciousness, you plead to any higher being that's listening to grant you a pinocchia, willing to give your life in exchange.... and wake up the next morning, with a "new-born" pinocchia in your hands.

name: Under the Moon: Crescent
description: Under the Moon: Crescent is a port of Under the Moon. It censors the erotic scenes from the original game, but adds new event CGs, a new scenario, and several endings.

name: Senninha GP Racing
description: Senninha GP is a brazilian arcade racing game, where you play with the characters from Senninha's Gang, racing in many famous tracks

name: Dragon Ball Z: Team Training
description: Dragon Ball Z: Team Training is a Pokémon Fire Red mod that makes your game all the Dragon Ball epicness you could ever want. Basically, if you wanted to have a pet Goku to fight your enemies with in Pokémon, this is all of that and more. There are currently 180 Dragon Ball "fighters" (Pokémon) in the game, and the locations reflect places in the DB world.

name: Final Fight
description: A port of Final Fight for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System was released as a launch title for the platform in Japan in 1990 and later in North America in 1991 and then in the PAL region in 1992. The SNES port removed the two-player co-op option, the Industrial Area level and playable character Guy. Most of the scene transitions were also edited out. In the arcade version, the player characters would be seen exiting the levels and breaking through doors unlike the SNES version. Due to hardware limitations the SNES version could only display two or three enemies on-screen, in contrast to the CPS arcade version, which could display up to nine or ten enemies on-screen; to make up for this difference, the SNES version features more stopping points than the arcade version and the enemy placement is vastly different.

name: Celebrity Darling
description:
When you jump head first into the entertainment industry to make your dreams come true, what do you find waiting for you?

A life-changing, non-stop scandal with the hottest boys in the business!
Your turbulent life in the industry is filled with trials - but what will be the future of your scandalous romance?

A popstar, an actress, a singer… decide which path you’ll take, and aim for the top!

name: Nuclear Empire
description: Mine energy and become a nuclear tycoon.

name: Death of a Wish
description:
Death of a Wish is a vicious action-RPG set in a nightmare filled with horrifying monsters and terrifying people.

Play as Christian, a Marked child raised by a cult and struggling to escape indoctrination, as he bands with others to challenge their oppressors. By taking down the four Sanctum Faiths: Father, Sister, Cardinal, and Priest, they will upend the order of the world.

Rend your foes asunder with magical combos called Arias in a demanding combat system that emphasizes tactical aggression. Enhance your abilities with powerful perks that significantly alter your approach to battle and the rhythm of combat. With a limitless array of ways to fight stylishly, build your character your way to destroy your foes.

Christian’s Corruption will constantly rise throughout his journey, pulling him towards a tragic end. He can hold back the Corruption by achieving high ranks in combat and performing long, graceful combos. Only by mastering battle and fighting with true elegance will he stand a chance against the Nightmares.

Explore a bleak dreamworld filled with surreal new characters, encounters, and stories. The theocratic city of Neo-Sanctum sets the stage for a struggle to determine the shape of society, and the fates of Christian and his companions. Delve into the secret underworld of the esoteric and abandoned to meet new allies who will aid you on your journey.

Christian’s world is rendered with a visual style like no other. Battles come to life in an animated spectacle of blood, light, and motion. Nicolo Telesca’s chilling score mixes electronic sounds with live instrumentation to unite the game with tense anxiety and crackling catharsis.

name: The Horus Heresy: Legions - Titandeath
description: Titandeath is a new expansion coming to the mobile game The Horus Heresy: Legions, bringing two new playable armies in the form of Loyalist Titans and Traitor Titans, new cards, and more.

name: Alien Hive
description:
Alien Hive is all about evolving aliens, blending match-3 with sliding tile puzzles for a game that feels both familiar and fresh. Swipe tiles to make matches – combine eggs to hatch cute baby aliens, and then help them fully evolve into Supreme Aliens.

Match resource tiles for upgrades that let you take command of the board, with the goal of building the ultimate alien hive. Strategically avoid the Naughty Bots, who block your progress, by crafting power-ups to eliminate these baddies. As you advance, you will uncover the mystery of the hidden aliens... and tame the Red Planet!

name: Nachkriegsratten Punk-Rock Puzzle
description:
Is there anything better than a good, relaxing puzzle game?
Of course: A bad, not-relaxing puzzle game!
Nachkriegsratten (Post-war rats), probably the first punk band to combine life-negating noise with turtle-like deceleration in a puzzle game.
24 mouth-painted pictures in 6 different sizes. are you brave enough? Have you ever danced with the Lumberjack Bear in the pale moonlight? Hia Hua!

name: Nivalis
description: Grow your business, manage restaurants and nightclubs, make friends and enemies, buy and decorate apartments, go fishing and maybe even find love in Nivalis, the city that stretches from the ocean to the clouds.

name: Kronii is Hungry
description: Kronii is Hungry is a fanmade visual novel featuring sixteen hololive members, in which you can interact with them, present them with items, take lessons to increase your status, and more.

name: The Meaning
description: "The meaning" is a psychological horror game, where you should expect the unexpected, It's a story about a man, who have lost everything & everyone. You'll view the life of Ethen Daniels from his perspective and submerged in the deep and sad reality of his life.

name: Project Impulse
description: Project Impulse is a VR movement shooter where you can climb anything and all interactions are physics based. Jump and slide to keep your momentum to gain an advantage over your enemies!

name: Equinox
description: Equinox is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter. Equinox mixes advanced movement techniques and projectile-based combat, producing a high-skill combat system. The game's objective is to capture the enemy's flag with adjustable team size, max score and match time.

name: Overage
description: Overage is a satirical fast-paced shooter set in a horrific 2.5D environment; your only goal is to kill as many demons as you can, in the most violent ways imaginable, using the most overpowered guns possible! Yes, you can craft a gun that shoots electric guitars.

name: Rainbow Tap
description: Rainbow Tap is a fresh new style music & rhythm game. It has 4 modes easy, medium, map and surfing with 16 songs in the first version of release. Go check out and enjoy this fresh new style of game tapping with the music & rhythm! Use ASDJKL to play a hit or just tap the screen if it's touchscreen.

name: The Farnese Hercules
description: The Farnese Hercules is an puzzle game with a new and unique central mechanic. Take on the role of the famed sculptors of history as you gaze into your material and see your work before you carve it and reveal it to the world.

name: Granvil's Fairytale
description: Granvil's fairytale is an interesting and challenging platform adventure that gives you a lot of satisfaction. By controlling the movements of the dwarf, you need to show above-average dexterity to move on to the next stage. At the same time, you will see an world full of obstacles and surprises!

name: Project Angels
description: In the 2050s, the Steel Waters security company and Angels are the only answer to the growing threat of maritime piracy in Red Tide Waters. Follow the story through the eyes of Steel Waters Commander-in-Chief and uncover the truth behind the strongest pirate congregation; Apollyon.

name: Frame: Portals on Steroids
description: Frames are devices that can stitch two parts in space together. And they can do much more: They can move, change size and gravity of objects and appear in any size or number... All these mechanics are used to provide mind-bending levels in this logic-based physics-puzzler.

name: King of Kalimpong
description: You're a fast-moving minivan with a projectile weapon in this Online Multiplayer PvP Battle Arena. Shoot rocks at your friends and capture their flag. Boost, jump, dodge, and flip to survive. Block projectiles with well-timed kicks, and smash other vehicles to bits when they get in your way.

name: Acclimate
description: Explore, gather, and manage resources to develop the capabilities to build and survive. Your survival rests on your ability to cast aside your opposition to technology and become technologically advanced.

name: Sporos
description: Sporos is a simple yet challenging puzzle game. The objective is to light up the cells in each level with a special seed known as the sporos. Players drag pieces onto the board one at a time, arranging them to extend all the way down every row and column. Sporos demands a mix of skill, luck, and logic; in order to succeed, players will conduct clever experiments like scientists in a lab. The soothing electronic music helps you keep your cool, while the colorful graphics lend the game a spacey, biological vibe. Sporos starts off easy, but with hundreds of levels and multiple solutions for each, it will take a true puzzle genius to master this stylish, colorful app.

name: Romancing SaGa: Minstrel Song Remastered
description:
Romancing SaGa: Minstrel Song Remastered retains everything that made the original game great. For example, it features the unique “Glimmer” and “Combo” systems, where characters can learn awesome new abilities in the heat of battle, the beautiful illustrations, and the wonderful soundtrack by Composer Kenji Ito.

It also features the series’ Free-form Scenario System, which lets you experience the story differently depending on how you play. You choose one of eight main characters, and as you explore the vast world, your actions and decisions will weave a story that is uniquely yours.

All that already makes the game a must-play for fans of classic turn-based RPGs, but this release adds even more.

The game now features remastered high-definition graphics, new quality-of-life features that make it easier and more convenient to play, and you can even expect some new elements too!

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Streets of Rage
description: The 8-bit port of Streets of Rage, released originally for the Sega Game Gear.

name: Streets of Rage 2
description: The 8-bit port of Streets of Rage 2, originally released for the Game Gear.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 77: The Hanasou Hanguru no Tabi
description: The Hanasou Kankokugo no Tabi is an educational quiz game in which the player travels to Korea.

name: Simple 2000 Series vol. 79: Akko ni Omakase! The Party Quiz
description: The Party Quiz: Akko ni Omakase: This entry in D3's Simple series of budget titles is set up like a television quiz show, with over 1000 questions included. In addition to a couple of single player quiz modes, the game lets up to eight players get together for multiplayer play using the multitap. The game includes four unique types of quizzes.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 82: The Kung Fu
description: Kung Fu is an Action game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 83: The Konchuu Saishuu
description: The Konchuu Saishuu: Strap on the Birkenstocks, jostle into the hemp shorts, and wander into the wilderness in search of bugs. As the story goes, a whole mess of insects have escaped from a laboratory. Gone. The hapless scientist at the lab charges the player with the task of finding the same bugs that fit the lab's specimen needs. The setting of the game takes place during summer vacation and the player adopts the persona of a boy with a fascination for insects. A rascally blue-haired girl plays the part of a rival that is also collecting specimens for the lab and barging in on your action.

name: Kimagure Strawberry Café
description: In Kimagure Strawberry Cafe you play as Ichigo Mizuhara (default name) and your luck left you when your parents suddenly decide to have a trip for a whole year. Things couldn't get any worse, now you are in charge of a cafe that your parents left you. Well things aren't so bad when you have a childhood friend and your cute underclassmen to help you run the cafe. And who say lady luck just left you, when now suddenly you are stranded to manage the cafe with 5 cute guys.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 85: The Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Quiz
description: The Sekai Meisaku Gekijou Quiz: The 85th volume of D3's Simple 2000 series is a quiz game featuring questions from 22 years of anime, totaling over 23 productions. The game includes over 5000 questions from such properties as Peter Pan no Bouken, Romeo no Aoi Sora, Trap Ikka Monogatari, and Flanders no Inu. Gameplay modes include Memorial Quiz, where you select from 8 works and answer questions set in multiple stages that follow the production's storyline, Solo Quiz, where you select from 8 works and 6 genres and work to keep a life meter from reaching zero, and Travel Quiz in which two players answer questions pulled from eight productions simultaneously. The game includes summaries of the original works which provide hints to performing well in the question sessions.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol.86: Menkyo Shutoku Simulation - Kaiseidouro Koutsuu-hou Taiouban
description: The Menkyou Shutoku Simulation is a simulation game about getting a driving license. the game features over 3000 different questions, the game features over his previous version (Simple 2000 Series Vol.25 - The Menkyo Shutoku Simulation) the traffic laws updates of the year 2005. The game features ordinary car license, ordinary motorcycle license, limited ordinary motorcycle license & moped license.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 89: The Party Games 2
description: Enjoy loads of simple 'but' addictive games suitable for all ages. Multi-playable with up to 4 people with a variety of courses to choose from. How you play is up to you, one game at a time or all 40! Go for the gold medal.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 93: The Unou Drill
description: The Unou Drill: Also released in PSP. Brain training hits the PS2. Based off Kodama Mitsuo's Right Brain Drill program, the game includes ten drill types as well as an IQ test. The game features 3 different difficulty levels: beginner, intermediate & advanced.

name: Darling II: Backlash
description: The Koi no engine: A racing themed love/relationship simulation game, Darling Special Backlash: Ai no Exhaust Heat follows the exploits of a team of young male drivers, who compete for the racing group Team Angstrom.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 98: The Roman Sabou
description: The Roman Sabou: In the game the player takes the role of the only daughter of a family that will have to run a sweet shop during a year of time. The game features over 884 different sweets to make. During the game the player will go with one of the 6 different boys to different places around the town to look for new ingredients for the different sweets, and also check often the balance of the money's shop since if there are loses at the end of any of the months is game over.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 100: The Otoko Tachi no Kijuu Houza
description: The Otoko Tachi no Kijuu Houza is an Action game, developed by Opus and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Monument Valley: Panoramic Edition
description:
Discover Monument Valley - A quest for forgiveness in a strikingly beautiful and mysterious world.

Embark on a journey of forgiveness along with Ida, the silent princess, through impossible environments and illusionary puzzles. Experience this meditative and calming puzzle game by manipulating monuments and creating evolving paths to explore new, surreal, and mysterious worlds.

Step into the new expanded world of Monument Valley: Panoramic Edition - and experience more intriguing impossibilities than ever before.

name: Cien Años Después
description: Cien Años Después is an indie narrative puzzle/adventure game. All text is in Spanish.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 104: The Robot Tsuku Rouze! - Gekitou! Robot Fight
description: The Robot Tsuku Rouze! - Gekitou! Robot Fight is an Action game, developed by HuneX and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 109: The Taxi 2
description: The Taxi 2 is a Racing game, developed by Tamsoft and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 115: The Roomshare to Iu Seikatsu
description: The Roomshare to Iu Seikatsu is a Simulation game, developed by ThinkArts and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol.116: The Neko-mura no Hitobito - Pagu Daikan no Akugyou San-mai
description: The Neko-mura no Hitobito: Pagu Daikan no Akugyou San-mai is an Action game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 117: The Zerosen
description: The Zerosen is a Simulation game, developed by Mobile & Gamestudio and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 118: The Ochimusha - Doemu Samurai Toujou
description: The Ochimusha - Doemu Samurai Toujou is an Action game, developed by Tamsoft and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 120: Saigo no Nippon Hei - Utsukushiki Kokudo Dakkan Sakusen
description: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 120: Saigo no Nippon Hei: Utsukushiki Kokudo Dakkan Sakusen is an Action game, developed by Tamsoft and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Mermaid Prism
description: Mermaid Prism is an Adventure game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Reijou Tantei: Office Love Jikenbo
description: Reijou Tantei - Office Love Jiken: When a female co-worker commits suicide, it's up to you to find out what really happened.Talk to fellow co-workers to put the pieces of the puzzle together.

name: Simple 2000 Honkaku Shikou Vol.001: The Shogi
description: The Shogi is a shogi game featuring different difficulty levels (From beginner to advanced), 8 different kind of opponents and different game modes, 2D & 3D boards, and 3 different locations. There are also a quiz mode with over 100 different shogi questions.

name: Simple 2000 Honkaku Shikou Vol.002: The Igo
description: The Igo is a igo game featuring different difficulty levels (From beginner to advanced), 8 different kind of opponents and different game modes, 2D & 3D boards, 3 boards, and 3 different locations. The game also features a complete igo tutorial in japanese.

name: Simple 2000 Honkaku Shikou Vol.003: The Chess
description: The Chess is a chess game featuring different difficulty levels (From beginner to advanced), 8 different kind of opponents and different game modes, 2D & 3D boards, 3 boards, and 3 different locations.

name: Simple 2000 Honkaku Shikou Vol.004: The Mahjong
description: The Mahjong is a mahjong game featuring different difficulty levels (From beginner to advanced), 30 different kind of professional opponents (men & women) and 2 different game modes, Annual Waging War (sort of a story mode) and free Waging War (Sort of a free mode in which the player can play against the professional players that he defeats in the story mode), featuring real tournament names. The player can choose at the beginning of the game between a male or a female character.

name: Simple 2000 Honkaku Shikou Vol.005: The Kiryoku Kentei
description: The Kiryoku Kentei is a igo game featuring different difficulty levels (From beginner to advanced) and different game modes (Story mode, free mode, etc). The game also features a complete igo tutorial in japanese.

name: Prison Architect: Gangs
description: They are organized and want to take control of your prison. Show them who’s in charge and stop their schemes! With Prison Architect: Gangs you’ll need to carefully manage your inmates, staff, and guard presence to avoid riots and ensure a peaceful - yet profitable - prison.

name: Ultimate Casino
description: Ultimate Casino is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Amedio Co., Ltd. and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2003 and in Europe in 2004.

name: Simple 2000 Hello Kitty Series Vol. 2: Minna de Sugoroku
description: Minna de Sugoroku is the second sugoroku game based on Hello Kitty characters, the first one was Gotouchi Hello Kitty Sugoroku Monogatari in the Playstation One console. The gameplay is the classic board game with mini puzzle and action diversions, each character has some star movements and when the stars reach 0 the character has to rest, in each board the player has to reach the board's goal first to win the match.

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 4: Urawaza Ikasa Mahjong Gai
description: Urawaza Ikasa Mahjong Gai is a mahjong game that features 2 different game modes, the first one is a story mode in which the player will advance through the story defeating the opponents, the other game mode is a free mode in which the player can play mahjong matches againts 3 computer opponents (that are the one that he can unlock in the story mode).

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 5: Love * Mahjong
description: Love * Mahjong is a Miscellaneous game, developed by HuneX and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2002

name: But That Was [Yesterday]
description: OneMrBean's first place award winning entry into the 9th Casual Gameplay Design Competition is a piece of interactive narrative about remembering the things that really matter in your life, and the people who gave them to you. You play as an initially morose fellow who takes you on a personal journey through his life and his memories, and offers up a simple but touching and surprisingly heartfelt experience that is wrapped up in a beautiful package.

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 11: Wandaba Style - Totsugeki! Mix Live Juice
description: Wandaba Style - Totsugeki! Mix Ki Juice is a music game with some adventure parts in which the story takes part, but the gameplay in the game are in the 15 songs parts in which the player to advance in the story has to make a good performance.

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 12: Street Golfer
description: Street Golfer is a Sports game, developed by Polygon Magic and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 14: Topai Dramatic Mahjong
description: Topai Dramatic Mahjong is a mahjong game basic in a manga that features at the beginning of the game 2 different game modes, the main one is the story mode in which the player will advance through the story winning mahjong matches, the other mode is a sort of a free mode in which the player can play against 3 different computer opponents.

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 17: Taisen! Bakudan Poi Poi
description: Taisen Bakudan Poi Poi: Sometime in the year 20XX, a super computer goes awry and ordinary citizens are recruited into a virtual world where everyone hefts massive bombs. Once hefted, bombs may be hurled at opponents in a frenetic blast 'em up. Run around the digital landscape, gather a bomb and then time your attacks against roving combatants while being pursued by other bomb toting miscreants.

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 20: Love*Mahjong 2
description: Love Mahjong 2 is a Mahjong game that takes place in various outdoors environments and involves playing the ancient board game with scantily-clad women. The game features unlockables costumes and pictures galleries.

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 22: Stylish Mahjong
description: Stylish Mahjong Usagi is a mahjong game that features different modes, the most special is the story mode one in which the player at the beginning of the game takes the role of a young high school student called Takeda (the player can unlock other characters playing the game) and will advance through the game winning mahjong matches.

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 24: Makai Tenshou
description: Makai Tenshou: Amakusa Shiro, leader of the Shimabara Rebellion, was put to death by the Tokugawa Shogunate. However, in his final moments, he renounced his god, and has been resurrected as a demon, bent on destroying the Tokugawa Shogunate and all who support it. To this end, he has brought back several warlords and swordsmen of his time, serving his every whim. Yagyu Jubei, a gifted young swordsman, scarcely escapes Shiro's attempt on his life. Discovering that his sister has been kidnapped, he sets out to put an end to Shiro's plans.

name: Simple 2000 Series Ultimate Vol. 25: Chou Saisoku! Zoku-sha King
description: Chou-Saisoku! Zokusha King BU no BU is a Racing game, developed by Tamsoft and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Dark Frontiers
description:
“Dark Frontiers” is the newest, gamified space realm governed by a Gamestarter produced DAO. As NFT standards and values are shifting towards promoting use-cases, Dark Frontiers’ goal is to drive mainstream adoption by enhancing the usability of NFTs through staking, item ownership, and the creation of real-world value through in-game items.

Embarking on the gamified metaverse, players will pilot their own spaceship and conquer new planets, defeat oppositions, form guilds and capture new and unique NFTs that can either be built on or sold on the open markets.

The $DARK token in Dark Frontiers will cover an array of opportunities. For players interested in dominating entire sections of a universe, say, by owning a moon, or a planet, they can use this digital plot of land to earn interest on their $DARK. The token will not only be used for staking, but players can also purchase and upgrade their starship Galactica’s using $DARK. After upgrading your ship for universal domination, you are prepared to stand head-to-head with other opponents that are in your way!

name: Roomli
description: Welcome to the maze of Roomli, the only objective is to move forward. Fight room after room and collecting the 120+ items and 50+ enemies with multiple variants of themselves. The game gets progressively harder which becomes troubling with your limited inventory.

name: Destroy All Humans!: Clone Carnage
description: Wreak havoc in Clone Carnage! This standalone DLC comes with 4 modes, 6 maps, and up to 4-player multiplayer. Split-screen lets you double the damage in local 2-player multiplayer. Unleash your wild side in Rampage, Armageddon, Race, and Abduction modes!

name: Good Morning, Radio
description: In school I had the first shift on the student radio station.

name: Rollerdrome
description: Rollerdrome is a third person action shooter that seamlessly blends high octane, visceral combat with fluid movement and tricking mechanics into one complementary and challenging whole, to create an original adrenaline-pumping shooter experience like no other.

name: Eternights
description: Eternights is a dating action game where you try to make the most out of life during the apocalypse. Monday: Go on a date. Tuesday: Clear dungeon. Friday: Freak out! The clock is ticking!!

name: Card Shop Tycoon
description: Card Shop Tycoon is a trading card shop simulator game where you earn money and build your card shop tycoon business.

name: FTL: Multiverse
description: FTL: Multiverse is a massive overhaul mod for the game FTL: Faster Than Light. It adds nearly 200 new playable ships, over 500 new enemy vessels, over 200 new weapons and drones, and over 30 brand new sectors to explore!

name: LiteracyPlanet: Word Mania
description:
Are you a champion word builder? Find out now!

Create as many words as possible from 15 letters in only three minutes. Drag letters into the word panel, click the "Mark" button and score points.

name: Ppoi: Hitonatsu no Keiken
description: Ppoi: Hitonatsu no Keiken is a PlayStation 2 game by Otomate.

name: Hiddenverse: Ariadna Dreaming
description: Ariadna finally gained enough power to unite all the worlds into one whole, but she does not even suspect that this will lead to disastrous consequences.

name: Rescue Quest Gold: Collector's Edition
description: The hit match-3 game is back! Join Boom and Zap on their fantasy adventure in Rescue Quest Gold, lovingly remastered as a premium game with more levels, enhanced effects, and improved gameplay.

name: Madden NFL 23
description: Play your way into the history books! Updates to your favorite modes deliver all-new ways to control your impact with every decision. Call the shots in Franchise, establish a legacy in Face of the Franchise: The League, and dominate in Madden Ultimate Team.

name: QL Pawn
description:
The aim of this interactive fiction is to escape from the land of Kerovnia, where strange occurrences are routine.

QL Pawn features a command interpreter which allows a very free use of English language instructions - it understands a wide range of words and accepts complex grammatical constructions.

name: Whenever You Can Breathe
description: An autobiographical short RPG about grocery shopping. It's about being stuck. It's a hanging out with your friends sim. It's about weird spatial relationships. It's about grounding.

name: Little Rock, MI
description: You're Troy, a rundown Park Ranger in the infamous Ishskwaday State Park, in Little Rock, Michigan. You spend your Sunday nights running drinking kids off their cabins and talking to your best friend Juno over a walkie talkie. Tonight is just like any other night, except there's something on the loose. Will you find it?

name: Narrow Path
description: A short reflection on eventuality.

name: Ahegal Seasons
description: You are the last man alive on the planet. Meet and undress beautiful women to save humanity. Find that special spot to make women ahegal. Master your lover skills and ladies will adore you. But be careful where you touch - You might end up with a broken heart, handsome!

name: Surviving the Aftermath: New Alliances
description: With Surviving the Aftermath: New Alliances, your actions now go beyond the confines of your settlement and can influence other societies in the Wasteland. New Alliances expands the World Map where beasts and bandits will react to your choices and can even take over strategic locations. Interacting with societies has become more impactful, allowing players to unite colonies under their banner. Uniting colonies requires players to maintain their reputation or risk creating more rivals to compete against. Specialists can go on covert missions and influence the world through sabotage, theft, espionage, and propaganda, but be mindful of the risks as failure will have devastating consequences.

name: Oppai Muse
description: Discover your perfect muse amidst music beats! This is a simple super casual rhythm game, full of colors and beauties! Collect stars and obtain hearts from women! Seek your path to the perfect date! Just remember - Girls will be listening. So don't step on her feet...

name: Amusement Park: Jumping Kid
description: Amusement Park: Jumping Kid is an unlicensed platforming game for the NES.

name: Luigi Run
description:
Run as long as you can!

Avoid obstacles and crush enemies! Collect bouncing mushrooms to get bigger, collect the mushroom again and become a GIANT!

In the giant form, nothing can resist you.

Take to the sky with your Happy Flying Cloud.

name: Monument Valley 2: Panoramic Edition
description:
Perception meets reality in Monument Valley 2, the atmospheric return of the acclaimed smash hit Monument Valley. Explore, Grow and Guide Ro and her Child through a magical and moving world.

Discover illusionary pathways and delightful puzzles as you learn the secrets of The Sacred Geometry.

In this meditative and calming puzzle game, follow the heart warming story of Ro in her journey through motherhood. Rediscover independence through manipulating monuments and evolving paths to explore new, surreal, and mysterious worlds.

name: Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix Deluxe
description:
