Super Mario Bros. Funk Mix is a full game overhaul based off of Super Mario Bros.
With a faithful replication of the NES art style and original music based off of Koji Kondo's work, this mod will have you feeling the Mario groove!

name: 1000 Hidden Snails
description:
Hidden object game in a surreal style. Extremely hard!

1000 hidden snails is a hidden object game in a surreal setting.
Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style.

Can you find 1000 snails? Just click on the snail!
Good Luck!

name: Ururun Quest: Koiyuuki
description: Ururun Quest - Koiyuuki is a fully voiced Japanese PS2 videogame classified as an 'Onna no Ko Senyou (Girl-targeted) Love Simulation+RPG' by its developer. It was released in 2005 and marketed as the first 'RPG targeted towards girls'. The player acts as the main character, Ruri, while she adventures around her world with her friends and finding new companions.

name: The Tennis & The Snowboard
description:
A compilation of:

- Simple 2000 Series Vol. 6: The Snowboard
- Simple 2000 Series Vol. 8: The Tennis

name: Simple 2000 Series 2-in-1 Vol. 3: The Puzzle Collection 2,000-mon & The Touyou Sandai Uranjustsu
description:
A compilation of:

- Simple 2000 Series Vol. 23: The Puzzle Collection 2,000-Mon
- Simple 2000 Series Vol. 40: The Touyou Sandai Uranjustsu: Fuusui, Seimeihanda, Ekisen

name: The Shooting & The Helicopter
description:
A compilation of:

- Simple 2000 Series Vol.35: The Helicopter
- Simple 2000 Series Vol.37: The Shooting - Double Shienryu

name: Totsugeki 64
description: PLAY AS MAY FROM GUILTY GEAR IN SM64! BUT LIKE ACTUALLY IN SM64!

name: Simple 2500 Series Portable Vol. 7: The Doko Demo Kanji Quiz - Challenge! Kanji Kentei 2006
description: The Doko Demo Kanji Quiz - Challenge! Kanji Kentei 2006 is a Puzzle game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Simple 2500 Series Portable Vol. 9: The My Taxi!
description: The My Taxi! is a Racing game, developed by Tamsoft and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: How did I get here?
description: You awake from a dream unable to remember where you are or how you got there. Far stranger is that you begin to be transported to different times and places unbidden. It seems that you are “stuck in a time-loop, cursed to hop through time for eternity,” unless you can figure out a way to master time travel and solve the mystery of why this is happening to you and how to break free of it.

name: Chameleon: DYH
description: A comic/manga inspired interactive game. The game requires the player to trust their instincts to determine best approach. Actions are chosen either through drawn pages or open stages. The gameplay will affect the characters' emotional strength as well as their skills/cards.

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 9: Atama ga Yoku Naru - The Me no Training
description: Atama ga Yoku Naru - The Me no Training is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Japan Art Media (JAM) and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 10: The Doko Demo Kanji Quiz
description: The Doko Demo Kanji Quiz is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 11: Mou Ichido Kayoeru - The Otona no Shougakkou
description: Mouichido Tsuueru - The Otona no Shougakkou is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Affect and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 14: The Jidousha Kyoushuujo DS
description: The Jidousha Kyoushuujo is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 20: The Senkan
description: The Senkan is a Simulation game, developed by Tamsoft and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 26: The Quiz 30,000-Mon
description: The Quiz 30000-Mon is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Luxe and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 28: The Illust Puzzle & Suuji Puzzle 2
description: The Illust Puzzle & Suuji Puzzle 2 is a Puzzle game, developed by DigitalWare and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Ghostwriters & Co.
description: Welcome to Ghostwriters & Co. You're looking for a job, so you've come here. You're not much of a writer, but you ARE a ghost. Hopefully they'll have some job you can do!

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 29: The Sports Daishuugou - Yakyuu-Tennis-Volleyball-Futsal-Golf
description:
Baseball, Tennis, Volleyball, Futsal, Golf!
Enjoy with this one!!

Popular sports in a large set!

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 31: The Chou-Dangan!! Custom Sensha
description: The Chou-Dangan!! Custom Sensha is an Action game, developed by ThinkArts and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 32: The Zombie Crisis
description: The Zombie Crisis is an Action game, developed by DreamFactory and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 33: The Crossword & Kanji Puzzle
description: The Crossword & Kanji Puzzle is a Puzzle game, developed by DigitalWare and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Simple DS Series Vol. 35: The Genshijin DS
description: The Genshijin DS is an Action game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 1: The Minna de Kart Race
description: The Minna de Kart Race is a Racing game, developed by TOSE and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Sound It Out Land 2
description: Kids learn to read on their own in Sound It Out Land 2. As kids journey through this musical theme park, they learn vowel and consonant blends in four- and five-letter words. Catchy songs and talking games teach kids to read words and sentences on their own -- developing their reading skills and self-confidence.

name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 2: The Minna de Bass Tsuri Taikai
description: The Minna de Bass Tsuri Taikai is a Sports game, developed by TOSE and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 3: Ason de Wakaru - The Party Casino
description: Ason de Wakaru - The Party Casino is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 4: The DokoDemo Asoberu - The Shooting Action
description: The DokoDemo Asoberu - The Shooting Action is an Action game, developed and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 5: The Block Kuzushi
description: The Block Kuzushi is a Puzzle game, developed and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Simple Wii Series Vol. 6: The Wai Wai Combat
description: The Wai Wai Combat is an Action game, developed and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: SpellRogue
description: SpellRogue is a turn-based, deckbuilding roguelike where you cast powerful spells using your Mana Dice, gain legendary artifacts, upgrade your spells and experiment with potent combinations to annihilate the Voidwalkers corrupting the world.

name: Whac-a-Mole
description: Whac-a-Mole is coming to your copy of Microsoft Windows! Watch in wonder as your mild-mannered mouse is transformed into the proverbial blunt object. Slam the enormous hammer down with a click of the mouse as you prowl the mole-infested landscape. Grit your teeth, take aim and BOP moles in a split second as they jump and taunt you to take your best shot! Roar as you score a direct hit, triggering a chorus of cartoon sound effects and hilarious animation! Unlike passive screen savers or intellectual adventures, Whac-a-Mole delivers pure entertainment as you absent-mindedly BASH devilish rodents.

name: Ghost of the Bus Stop
description: Sin descripción

name: Arma 3: Art of War Charity Pack
description: Admire splendid community artwork, recover priceless cultural property, and proudly wear your parade uniform in the Arma 3 Art of War charity DLC.

name: Captain America: Super Soldier
description: The Nintendo DS port of Captain America: Super Soldier.

name: Batman: Return to Arkham - Arkham Asylum
description: A remastered version of Arkham Asylum developed by Virtuos using Unreal Engine 4 for the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. It includes all previously released downloadable content.

name: Medarot Dual: Kuwagata Version
description: Medarot Dual is an arena-action spinoff of the Medabots series. Like most Medabots games, Dual is split into two separate versions.

name: Batman: Return to Arkham - Arkham City
description: Batman: Arkham City sends players soaring into Arkham City - a heavily fortified sprawling district in the heart of Gotham City. Batman Arkham City introduces a brand-new story that draws together an all-star cast of classic characters and murderous villains from the Batman universe.

name: Project Sundown
description: Project Sundown is a first-person wave-based Zombie Shooter.

name: Porthole
description:
Follow the compass, seek the depths.
Turn and move with the arrow keys.
Press the buttons to document your voyage.

name: Elevator Action Invasion DLX
description:
A robotic invasion is underway, and only you and your partner can stop it in Elevator Action Invasion by UNIS. This listing is for the Deluxe (DLX) model. A smaller Standard model is also available.

Focusing on dual player shooting action, this action-packed game puts you into the shows of two well-armed special agents, who infiltrate a facility that has been overtaken by an army of evil cyborg soldiers. Take aim and earn combos to rack up the highest score, and use the elevator controls on the control panel to navigate through the complex.

Adding an extra dimension of fun to it, Elevator Action Invasion DLX comes in a striking upright cabinet that includes real doors that open and close in front of the screen, and a rumble base to make you feel like you’re really inside of an elevator!

name: La Madriguera
description: The game takes place in a simple scene in which our character will try by all means to get a piece of cake. Sure, as long as that doesn't mean having to get out of his chair.

name: Pingo Adventure
description: Pingo Adventure is a cute 3D platformer with interesting physics simulation. Follow Pingo to explore the world, solve puzzles, play mini games and even customize your Pingo with the costumes unlocked from the adventures!

name: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution
description: The long-lost sequel to the original Shantae, is back in development after being put on the shelf for nearly two decades. Building off the original game code from the early 2000s, this once-canceled title will be completed and released physically on a Game Boy Advance-compatible game cartridge.

name: Battery Low
description:
Tap on time to charge your phone and deliver it to the charge point like a flip master! It's a perfect time to save the low battery and your phone too!

The Mobile phone is out of battery, and you have a zillion ways to put it on the charger! Just tap on time and aim at the target!

Make a clear strategy before you make your move, you don't want to break your phone while trying to do a home flip!

name: Genshin Funkin'
description: Travel around the world of Teyvat as Hu-Tao, as you challenge others in a sing off. With 3 full weeks featuring fan songs and covers sung by some of the original Genshin voice actors! This was made as a tribute to the incredible talents of the Genshin voice actors. Includes easy and normal difficulties respectively, along with swapped charts to play the opponent’s side!

name: Paper Bride 3
description: Paper Bride 3 is a Chinese horror mystery puzzle game. This time the story takes place in Moshui Village, which is near Zangling Village, and Fulu City, a small town nearby.

name: Solara: Starlight Horizon
description: Solara: Starlight Horizon is a multiplayer space dogfighting game. Fight, explore, trade, smuggle contraband, mine, craft, and undertake missions to gain favor with various factions throughout the universe. Earn credits, upgrade your ship, purchase new spacecraft, and explore a sci fi sandbox.

name: Clem
description: Clem is a narrative-driven puzzle adventure game with a dark twist. Wake up in a world where puzzles intertwine with exploration, weaving a unique narrative rooted in alchemy. A voice awakens you. It gives you purpose. To guide you, you find a notebook with mysterious entries and a house to explore.

name: Super Scattergories
description: The classic category game is back and better than ever! Now you can test yourself or challenge your friends and family with four all new brain-teasing games, plus the original Scattergories. Put on your thinking cap and use your quick wits to go for that perfect score!

name: Drifting Kings
description: Drifting Kings is Stylized Arcade offline/online Drifting/Touge/Gymkhana racing game with a colorful and stylized environments. fun to play ,hard to master.

name: JumpStart Adventures 6th Grade: Mission EarthQuest
description:
JumpStart Adventures 6th Grade: Mission EarthQuest is a JumpStart game released by Knowledge Adventure in 1998. It is designed to cover a full curriculum for sixth grade.
In this game, an organization known as EarthQuest must stop a spacecraft's artificial intelligence, A.R.T., from wreaking havoc on the ecosystems of the world in his quest to redesign Earth.

name: Memoir
description: A short memoir that recounts the memories of him first love

name: Frogger and the Rumbling Ruins
description:
After the popular Apple Arcade game 'Frogger in Toy Town,' an all-new Frogger game 'Frogger and the Rumbling Ruins' (Frogger and the Rumbling Ruins) leaps into action!

Make your way through puzzle-ridden ruins and unravel the mysteries of the Ancient Salientians.

name: March March!
description: March! March! is a turn-based auto battler with puzzle-based mechanics, inspired by the classic puzzle game Tetris Each turn your army gets a regiment that varies in formation and size. Tell your units where to march! march! and they will do the rest.

name: Choke on my Groundhog, You Bastard Robots
description: Choke on my Groundhog, You Bastard Robots is twin-stick shoot 'em up. Each time you die, your previous playthrough returns as a copy to assist you. The number of ghost allies increases with each new life making the player stronger with each death.

name: RLCraft
description:
This started out as a simple little thing I was putting together for my own server and friends, and since then it's turned into something pretty ridiculous. I've gotten some requests about releasing it as a modpack so here it is.

RLCraft, the RL standing for Real Life or Realism and is a take on another mod I made for Unreal called RLCoop that generally has a similar goal, is my interpretation of what I've always wanted in Minecraft when it comes to pure survival, adventuring and RPG, and immersion. I hand selected many mods and individually tweaked each and every one to fit the exact play-style I was looking for, making sure they all worked fluidly with each other, adding my own custom scripts for various changes to vanilla behavior, etc.

Bottom line is, this ain't your dad's Minecraft, and you're going to die...a lot. Just be prepared for that. This tends to happen whenever I make mods for any game for some reason...it usually ends up being unfairly difficult.

name: Air Twister
description: Soar through the sky battling against invaders in this all-new fantasy endless shooter from legendary game creator, Yu Suzuki. Players will assume the role of Princess Arch fighting back against bizarre invaders to save their planet from destruction. They’ll rain down their homing arrows to trace graceful arcs of light across beautiful, artfully crafted stages, before they pierce their foes. With a fun and easy touchscreen swipe-shooting gameplay mechanic, the destiny of the planet is in the player’s hands.

name: CubeLoop
description: CubeLoop is a first-person puzzle game that you can play solo or cooperatively online. Will you be able to figure out what riddle is hidden behind each room? Or will you die and die in an endless loop? Only logic can save you.

name: Cooking Mama: Cuisine!
description:
Chop, bake, stew, and more.

The latest Cooking Mama title is available in Apple Arcade!

Choose ingredients and cooking tools, then find a dish!
In Cooking Mama: Cuisine!, find recipes by choosing ingredients and cooking tools.
Start cooking when you've found a combination that works!
Try to find different combinations to see what dishes you can make.

name: Galaxy Angel Ex
description: Galaxy Angel Ex is a "supplementary" videogame released by Broccoli. In the "main storyline," Tact and all of the Angels (including Chitose) are hanging out together on the Elsior and having fun.

name: Cactu-sama
description: Sin descripción

name: CR Galaxy Angel
description: CR Galaxy Angel is a pachinko simulation game for Playstation 2 with Galaxy Angel content, which lets you experience playing on taiyo electric pachiko machines.

name: Galaxy Angel II: Key to the Infinite Corridor
description: Two new members join the Rune Angel Troupe, Natsume Izayoi and Roselle Mateus. Taking place 6 months after the events of Verel's Insurrection, the crew find themselves In the midst of a reassignment upheaval.

name: Galaxy Angel II: Eternal Recurrence
description: It is set 3 months after the events of the previous game, Mugen Kairō no Kagi. The combined Angel Wing join Tact on Juno in celebrating the 5 year anniversary since the liberation of the EDEN civilization from the Val-Fasq.

name: Galaxy Angel II: Gate to the Absolute
description: It features a brand new cast of Angels, the Rune Angel Troupe, and primarily takes place in a parallel universe called Neue.

name: Gust of Wind
description:
Stealth game set in a post-apocalyptic world of rusted technology. Encouraged playstyle is mainly stealth, but melee combat is also possible. The game's UI is as minimalistic and low-key as possible to avoid breaking the immersion.

The story is centered around a delivery mission by sail ship, its purpose being to deliver war technology to a town defending itself against attackers. Player character is the stealth expert of the crew, doing missions involving stealing, spying and sabotage.

name: Grim's Downfall
description: Based upon the film, Grim is trapped by Boogie in a nightmare of endless falling. The Reaper must now battle a group of underworld monsters within his own dream in order to avoid a rude awakening.

name: Deal or No Deal
description: A simple web browser edition of the game show Deal or No Deal.

name: SCP: Terror Hunt
description: Terror Hunt is a modification for "SCP: Containment Breach". The mod is developed by the same creator of the Five Nights at Freddy's Mod. This mod adds and alters many aspects of the base game. These additions include new SCPs, new rooms, new items, and a brand new storyline for the main character!

name: Anxiety Wires
description: An exploration game about fears and how they can hold us, but, most importantly, about the journey of a person who tries to get rid of those distressing feelings that fear can cause.

name: Deathtrap
description:
Sonic & Mario are in Hell but they have no intention to stay here
and they want to escape ! Plus , they have infinite lives too…
Don’t let them go !
This game was made for the re-release of Lupin’s flashcarts , i hope you’ll enjoy it !

name: Cursed Exped
description: Take part in the first journey of the Cursed Exped. Your mission is to cleanse cursed items in a haunted house. Use your tools to locate and investigate items. Create a ritual area to mark your location of interest and bring items with energy there to progress through the game. Be careful though, the unknown is always watching you and waiting around every corner. Stay safe and happy investigating.

name: Cloudy Super Mario Bros. U
description: A mod of New Super Mario Bros U featuring 30 new levels and brand new tilesets.

name: Tofu Girl
description: Tofu Girl is a casual game developed by JoyPac. Tofu Girl is a casual game in which a little girl attempts to climb as high as she can through a tofu tower. Mission will be to assist her in completing this amusing task.

name: Moomin: Welcome to Moominvalley
description: Moomin: Welcome to Moominvalley is a farming simulation game based on the world of the Moomins, where you can hang out with Moomin and his friends and build your very own Moominvalley. Enjoy activities such as farming, fishing and much much more!

name: Peter Rabbit: Hidden World
description:
Search for hidden objects in the world of Peter Rabbit
Introducing the second Peter Rabbit game by Poppin Games, creators of hit app Peter Rabbit's Garden (over 3 million downloads)!
Search for hidden objects in cute illustrations that faithfully recreate the style of the original books.

name: Ante Mortem
description: What would be your first and last wish if you died tomorrow? Explore this mysterious and frightening island. Solve its puzzles. And discover the truth before sinking into the purest madness that can exist... That of knowing your death.

name: Blaze the Cat in Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog which changes Sonic for Blaze the Cat.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 3 - Season 3: Vibin'
description: In Chapter 3 Season 3: Vibin’, the Island is one giant party. Bounce around in Reality Falls, ride atop creatures, brave the Screwballer coaster, and revel with a new arsenal. Drop into Season 3 and spread the good vibes!

name: Extreme Air Snowboarding
description: Sin descripción

name: QuadraPop Robotic
description: A futuristic looking version of the classic java game QuadraPop

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Sonic the Hedgehog was one of the games adapted for release in arcades for the Mega Play hardware. While the Mega-Tech version is largely the same game as the original, the Mega Play version has lots of gameplay differences.

name: Buzzed
description: Retro game where you help bees get pollen!

name: Deep Down 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Cyberdekay
description:
Dolphin virus threatens free networks: The dolphin virus spreads through and corrupts active memory, ravaging programs and data alike. The decentralized networks have been hit harder than any other and will soon suffer total memory corruption.

In desperation, the spread of corruption has halted by deactivating core memory, rendering entire systems impassable and hence their resident programs unusable.

Sources in the scene have, at great personal cost, siphoned a military-grade antivirus program that can be our only hope for eradicating the virus - providing its sophisticated layers of encryption can be broken.

We must now make our last stand, reactivate and scour dormant system memory, seek decryption programs, unlock and run the anti-virus to eradicate the dolphin virus.

name: Captain Planet and the Planeteers
description: Fight real ecological threats through nine levels of deadly pollution. Five eco-heroes summon Earth, Fire, Wind, Water and Heart to defend our planet from destruction! With magic energy, they combine forces to summon Captain Planet, the champion crusader for Earth safety!

name: Arcade Archives: The Tower of Druaga
description:
THE TOWER OF DRUAGA is an action RPG game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1984.
Go upstairs one after another while getting various items hidden on each floor of the huge tower controlled by DRUAGA, and rescue your lover KI who was trapped on the top floor.

name: MyFloppy Online!
description: Design your Floppy avatar, customize your room, battle, rob and visit other Floppys online!

name: Espionage
description:
Infiltrate secure locations and lurk in the shadows, acquiring information by any means necessary before leaving undetected!

Espionage is a retro, 2D stealth game where you must sneak through different locations undetected to uncover a nefarious business transaction in the heart of your homeland.

You are Kathleen "Umbra" Null, the most experienced operative for the Terrorist Detective Agency, an organization devoted to rooting out and stopping terrorism before it can start.

Beautiful Environments- Stunning pixel art, combined with amazing sound effects allow for gorgeous environments during missions.

Tactical Stealth Gameplay- Espionage has a copious amount of strategy and stealthy gadgets to use across Umbra's many missions

Extensively Various Enemies- Espionage contains a myriad of enemies, with each enemy having a different method to be taken down, as well as different abilities.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent
description: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent is a fully-fledged strategy RPG set in the world of Class of Heroes! Create your own party of students in a fantasy realm! Pick them up and guide them to victory against the monster hordes!

name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu
description: Labyrinth of Zangetsu is new 3D dungeon RPG by Acquire. Its gameplay systems are a return to the "roots" of hack-and-slash. It is a title that emphasizes "wa" (the Japanese-style), which is Acquire’s specialty. It depicts a “deep” world view illustrated by ink painting brush strokes. And features a “mixture of wa” sound that channels the music of Japan’s various eras, from "gagaku" (traditional Japanese music and dance) to "noh" (traditional Japanese masked dance-drama). Labyrinth of Zangetsu is developed based on these four keywords.

name: RTX Sweeper
description: Minesweeper, but on steroids.

name: The Battle for Mata-Nui
description: The Battle for Mata Nui is an online game based on the LEGO Bionicle franchise. It takes place during the invasion of the Bohrok swarms. The Bohrok are on a mission to completely destroy the island of Mata Nui in order to return it to how it was in the "before-time." It's up to the Toa to stop them and protect their people.

name: Gakkou no Kaidan
description: Gakkou no Kaidan is a game for the Sega Saturn console. It was released in 1995 to accompany the live-action movie Gakkou no Kaidan. It was available only in Japan, in Japanese.

name: Reptile Breeder
description: Sin descripción

name: Saints Row: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Collector's Edition
description:
Included in the Collector's Edition:
The Game: A physical copy of the game
Figurine: Serie Grandista Jolyne Cujoh - Special colour (26cm)
Prison Plate: A prison plate representing the convict number of Jolyne Cujoh incarcerated at the Green Dolphin Street Prison.
Deluxe Edition Bonus: The animation Special Event Color Set (5 types), an exclusive coloring set from the animation special event.
Season Pass: 4 characters will be included in this Season Pass, the owners will be granted with an early access on those characters.
Season Pass Bonus: An exclusive costumes for the 2 of the most iconic characters.
Collector Box: An exclusive collector box representing Jolyne and the other JOJO heroes.

name: Far Cry 6: Season Pass
description: Embrace the Far Cry legacy and play as the villains with the FAR CRY 6 Season Pass. In three separate DLC episodes, take control of Vaas Montenegro, Pagan Min and Joseph Seed (all played by the original cast) and fight to escape their twisted minds. In a second offering, travel back to the distant future of 2007 with the critically acclaimed FAR CRY 3: Blood Dragon, now also on the newest generations of platforms.

name: Aluna Rift
description:
Illuminate the void of space as you hunt Colossal Bosses in an upgradable time-bending spacecraft. Fly solo or co-op across endless procedural galaxies, or battle each other in PvP. Features challenging survival modes, ultra-wide screen support, global leaderboards and more!

Aluna Rift is a challenging top-down shooter with single player, co-operative and PvP game modes. The game is filled with vibrant visuals, addictive action and scintillating sounds. The main game mode is a mixture between wave-based enemies, random encounter minigames, and hunting colossal bosses. In addition there is an ‘Endless Survival’ mode akin to classic shoot ‘em ups from the golden age of arcade gaming.

name: Medarot 5: Susutake Mura no Tenkousei - Kabuto Version
description: Medarot 5 follows the adventures of Koishimaru Tensan, who has recently moved to the small town of Susutake. Koishimaru gets a new Medarotch and meets a boy named Yamato Shijimi, but his Medarotch breaks after he gets pushed into cow manure. He later finds an abandoned Medarotch and Medarot Chrotojil inside of a tree and is forced to activate them in a sudden Robottle.

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Second Coming Edition
description:
Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed is a video game in the open-world action-adventure genre, serving as a remake of the original 2006 game. It is the sequel to the remade Destroy All Humans! and marks the sixth instalment in the franchise.

In this game, players take on the role of Crypto, navigating through diverse global locations such as England, Russia, and the United States. The objective is to complete various missions and overcome human adversaries. The gameplay incorporates a range of weapons and abilities, allowing players to defeat enemies by employing tactics such as mind-controlling humans and utilizing advanced alien technology.

The Second Coming Edition includes the following content:

- Crypto Statue – 70cm/27.6 inch
- Arkwobbler Statue
- Embossed metal plate
- Artbook
- Orchestral score (CD)
- Reprobed: Challenge Accepted DLC (digital)
- Reprobed: Skin Pack (digital)
- Destroy All Humans! – Clone Carnage (digital)

name: Kao the Kangaroo: Kaollector Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Gaelco Arcade 2
description:
The Gaelco Arcade 2 cartridge for Evercade features 6 action-packed arcade games from Spanish developer Gaelco, featuring Big Karnak’s hack-and-slash fun, TH Strikes Back’s sci-fi platforming, World Rally 2’s high-speed racing, Maniac Square’s brain-bending puzzling, and competitive sporting action with Squash and Touch and Go!

The cartridge includes following 6 games:
- Big Karnak
- TH Strikes Back: Thunder Hoop 2
- World Rally 2
- Maniac Square
- Squash
- Touch and Go

name: Pokémon Scarlet and Pokémon Violet Double Pack
description: A double pack containing the Pokémon Scarlet and Pokémon Violet games is available for pre-order as a digital downloadable version or as a packaged version.

name: Inertial Drift: Twilight Rivals Edition
description: Set in a 90s retro future, ‘Inertial Drift: Twilight Rivals Edition’ is an arcade racer that tears up the racing rule book with innovative twin-stick control and completely reimagined driving mechanics.

name: Master of Knights: Seven Trials
description: Sin descripción

name: Metro Blossom
description: Sin descripción

name: Xtal
description: XTAL is a hybrid TPS/Hack 'n' Slash set in an arcane world. Fight off enemies corrupted by an unknown power and explore evocative and mysterious landscapes. Upgrade your arsenal and make use of a forgotten technology to discover the fate of a kingdom in ruin.

name: Sheeplings
description: With 'Sheeplings' children can discover the use of mobile devices and their possibilities in a gentle way. The app lets children experience a day of a lamb and its mother in a blooming meadow. There are no rules, goals or tasks. When children engage with the digital device for the first time, they can observe the lovingly designed and animated animals. Simple touch gestures can then be used to discover the interactivity of the game: The sheep follow the finger or can be stroked. A technically sophisticated simulation makes it a lot of fun to stroke the grass with your fingers. And children who have already tried out the app loved making the colorful flowers literally sound. The playful and self-directed experience is not disturbed by any menus. At the beginning, the game explains to parents how to prevent accidental switching to other apps. The duration of the game can also be set here. After the time has expired, the day comes to an end with a sunset. When the sheep lies down to sleep, the interaction options end and the game comes to an end.

name: Final Fantasy VIII
description: The PC version of Final Fantasy VIII was released with several alterations, some of which still linger in later versions.

name: Puzzle World: Cute Monsters
description: Welcome to the game "Puzzle world - cute monsters". Here you will find exciting conundrums in the form of puzzles. You have to combine many different fragments together, while creating a whole picture. Dive into the fascinating world of cute monsters! Don't stop at one - collect them all!

name: Qwilight
description: Qwilight is a free BMS/BMSON rhythm game that supports the most features among other rhythm games. It has various game mods, supporting various hardwares, rich online features, great accessibility to make no longer "BMS is difficult" And, it provides community-driven achievements and titles.

name: Animals
description: "Animals" is a game based on the mechanics of "3 in a row". The goal of Match-3 puzzles is to make groups: lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

name: Witch Epoch
description: Witch Epoch is a game about a Witch fighting in the otherworld with various monsters that are getting stronger every time, collecting colored bonuses the player can cause damage and if the color of the bonus matches the color of the monster's weakness, then he will receive maximum damage!

name: Arcade Flight
description: You're controlling a plane that is going forward in an infinite and randomized space filled with barriers. Use your reflexes to dodge the incoming barriers in high speed. Collect coins along the way to later spend them in the store section.

name: Chance at Life
description: The events unfold in an old house built in 1876. Two friends returning from a party were caught in a storm. They had to stay in an abandoned house to wait out the bad weather. To survive, the friends had to unravel the secrets of the mansion, go after the one who is trying to help.

name: Monsterlands
description: Monsterlands is an exciting rogue-like survival game. Fight against the monsters and try to survive by upgrading your weapons and items.

name: Kotomasho: I Can't Believe This Neet Guy Turned Into a Magical Girl!
description: A Gameboy Color and Anime inspired adventure game with RPG elements. The protagonist is a neet 21 year old guy who suddenly acquires the Power of Dreams and transforms into a Magical Girl.

name: Sanction
description: Sanction is a procedurally generated post-apocalyptic world where you are a prisoner sanctioned to come from the safety of your doomsday bunker to gather supplies for the community. Your freedom and your communities lively-hood relies on you. Survive the worn-torn wasteland left from the final war.

name: The Butcher
description: Fighting your way through hellish enemies to seek vengeance in this dark-fantasy action game.

name: Team Force 2
description: A comic, funny and cute online multiplayer third person shooter game for everyone with fantastic cartoon 3D next generation graphics and captivating gameplay.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: BDSM Room
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sex adventures of a girl and futanari couple and their dominatrix, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: The Forest Prison
description: In 2160, political dissidents were not sentenced directly to death but were sent for 'cognitive and orientation tests' to a prison from which no one had ever escaped alive. This is the story of James Webb, who was sentenced to life in prison.

name: Final Fantasy VIII
description: The Steam version of Final Fantasy VIII comes with several in-game enhancements, including a speed-up option to fast-forward through cutscenes and FMVs and built-in cheats, such as Battle Assist, making battles almost impossible to lose. Like Final Fantasy VII, the re-release version comes with the Magic Booster feature that allows players to boost their characters' magics to 100. Achievements and cloud save data storage are also available. Windowed mode and high-resolution displays (up to 1920x1080 @ 60 Hz) are now supported. However, the game still uses the original MIDI tracks from the 1999 version, rather than the PlayStation version music, unlike the 2012 re-released Final Fantasy VII which has received a musical update. Chocobo World is playable directly from the launcher after booting Final Fantasy VIII.

name: Futanari Sex: The Gym
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a sexy futanari personal trainer taking the training of her sweet and oldest friend to another level…

name: Logica Emotica
description: An emoji infused puzzle game for you!

name: TDS: War Games
description: TDS: War Games is a fast paced, local 2-4 player split-screen shooter where you and your friends competitively combat each other over the objective set. Customize your player loadout, choose an arena, setup a game-mode and start battling. Only the merciless will claim victory.

name: Shadow of Asha
description: Asha's shadows are invading and corrupting Narkian. It's up to you to stop her!, level up, explore the village for resources and become stronger.

name: Second Thoughts
description: Second Thoughts is a psychological text-based game where each day you are tasked with executing someone based on the limited information provided until one person remains with their full story revealed.

name: Space Theory
description: "Space Theory" - a space top down shooter game. The player controls a spaceship and fights against space pirates, blows up enemy space stations and acquires upgrades at the end of each mission.

name: Pacifish
description: Pacifish is an incremental fishing management game with several mechanics to interact with and improve. It can be played both idly, or more actively to progress faster.

name: Meat & Greed
description: In the atmospheric puzzle-platformer Meat & Greed, you will experience the horrors of a slaughterhouse from the perspective of different animals. Solve riddles and collaborate with other animals to try and escape this ill-fated factory.

name: Dune Strider
description: Dune Strider is an Adventure-Strategy Game in which you, the player, take command of a merchant controlling a Sand-Barge in a desert and use it to travel and explore the land around you. The road to settlements to sell your goods is filled with dangers and opportunities.

name: Saikyou Todai Shogi
description: Saikyou Todai Shogi (aka Saikyou Toudai Shougi) is a shogi game with different game modes vs another human player or computer opponents.

name: Saikyou Todai Shogi 2
description: Saikyou Todai Shogi 2 is a shogi game that features different difficulty levels, different game modes (vs, training, tournament, etc.), etc. The game features also an auto mode in which the player can watch and learn how to play watching the different computer movements.

name: The Box Game
description: The Box Game is a 2D top down platformer game written in Java, and your objective is to get to the end of the labyrinth. The game has 11 levels that get progressively larger each level. More gameplay elements will get introduced to you as you go, and in total the game will take roughly 10-20 minutes to fully play through, depending on your skills (or maybe luck?).

name: Breath of Dragon II
description: Sin descripción

name: Breath of Ghosts
description: Breath of Ghosts is a first-person horror game made in realistic 3D graphics that immerses you in an atmosphere of horror and scares you in every way. The main goal is to survive and be saved.

name: Kawaii Hentai Girls 2
description: It's a relaxing anime puzzle with cute kawaii girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality artwork.

name: Worker Riot
description: A worker who has been left without a salary is a dangerous opponent. Armed with a hammer, he will not leave them alone. Help him defeat them all. Beat out of them everything they owe you for your work

name: Dead Zone
description: Dead Zone is a multiplayer first and third person survival shooter. Your task is to survive within a closed area filled with many enemies.

name: Evangeline's Defense
description: The game that mixes the mechanics of Top Down shooters with those of Tower Defense. Collect materials, build your defenses and kill as many demons as you can as you move freely around the world and defend the Archangel Evangeline in this fearless adventure

name: Kunai Strike
description: A cyberpunk-ninja FPS 3D-platformer. Throw kunai and teleport to them across 5 individual levels. Chain teleports with wall-runs and jumps to reach the goal in the fastest time and avoid falling to certain death along the way.

name: The Backrooms: Mass Extinction
description: If you noclip out of reality in the wrong areas, you'll end up in the Backrooms. The old moist carpet, the mono-yellow rooms and the hum-buzz of the fluorescent lights will be your only comfort in the endless purgatory you have found yourself in. Don't bother crying out for help. Nobody is left.

name: Ninja Break
description: Ninja Break is an arcade game that lets the user knock out Ninja themed items with a unique Katana paddle and Shuriken ball. Unique Animated levels, Mini-Bosses and Powerups to collect as you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory.

name: Drunken Fist 2: Zombie Hangover
description: The inebriated antics of Drunken Fist are back with brutal vengeance as you take the role of a hungover rocker in Drunken Fist 2: Zombie Hangover! Waking up in a city full of undead hordes, it’s your job to stumble through the streets pummeling zombie op…

name: Pewt 'em Up!
description: Pewt 'em Up! is a retro inspired arcade space shoot 'em up with lots of upgrades, achievements, extras and more.

name: Speedway Challenge 2022
description: Speedway Challenge 2022 is a 3D speedway game. Feel speedway emotions thanks to realistic riding physics. Play online mode with friends or local in career mode, league mode, challenges, tournament and quick matches. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Morlush
description: The daily life of a Reaper apprentice in Morlush. You have to go to different parts of the magical island, to fulfill the reaper's order, on your way you will encounter various dangers and monsters.

name: The Office
description: The Office is a visual novel for adults only. In this game, you control a guy who just got a new job, but was late on his first day of work. His new boss is unhappy with this delay... The game is filled with sex scenes, humor, romance.

name: Overdrive
description: Drop into a large multiplayer experience with modes such as Battle Royale & Assault. Rise to the top using custom attachments from the weapon gunsmith and explore a war-torn island with many hidden secrets.

name: Rabbit Burn
description: Fabulous riches, flying fists, and sensual embraces abound in this dazzling arena where rabbit-masked men and scantily clad bunny girls sprint to and from, dodging explosions, brawling with enemies, making love, or just dancing to the music.

name: Final Blockade
description: In this war, you have to play a brave man, go out and defeat zombies and find the cause of the end.

name: DarkSelf: Other Mind
description: DarkSelf: Other Mind is a first-person psichological horror game about the growth of darkness over time. Explore the house, life and mind of John Parse. Complete puzzles inside the mind of John Parse to unlock his memories, and don't let the DarkSelf catch you.

name: Infinity Dungeons
description: Sin descripción

name: Lanescape
description: Lanescape takes the classic and familiar shifting (sliding) puzzlers into the next level with an interesting twist.

name: Wings 1941
description:
Experience the thrills of the 10 most famous battles of World War 2 in this retro voxel shooter. Guide your aircraft through a hail of bullets and enemy planes, ships and tanks.

Upgrade your aircraft and take on the most epic bosses such as the Yamato Battleship, the great Zeppelin, the fearsome Tiger Tank and many more!
General Brandon will guide you through each mission. Do you have what it takes to beat the 10 epic campaigns like Battle of Midway, D-Day, Stalingrad, El Alamein and more!

name: Roller Ball
description: Roller Ball is a 3D platforming game, inspired by Super Monkey Ball and Ball Race, dodge obstacles and smash through walls to get to the end of each level and find multiple ways to complete levels, has endless mode and infinite levels

name: Tricky Doors
description: Tricky doors is a captivating game that offers a variety of puzzles. Find a creative way to get out of each room. Tricky doors is a point-and-click game in the "escape the room" genre with plenty of mini-games and complicated quests.

name: Down the Drain
description: Take a trip below the sink with Marta in this top-down 2D shooter through randomly generated mazes of pipes. Defeat gooey enemies, overcome strong bosses, and learn what's really going on when trouble starts brewing beneath our tubs and under our streets.

name: Villwars
description: Villars is a real-time strategy game. Control your troops and reach the very center of the enemy lands! Defend your lands, attack and think over the battle strategy depending on the terrain and position.

name: Pedro Land DX
description: An intense, retro run-and-gun platformer western game!

name: Mailman
description: "Mailman" is a 2D old-school top down arcade game ported to PC. It puts you in the role of a postman who has to deliver all the letters to the mailboxes.

name: Dwarven Towers
description: The dwarves are forced now to build towers and every time one of the witches casts a spell one of the dwarves is turned into a frog. heir only hope is to build as many towers as possible and score enough magical points.

name: Pussy 5
description: "Pussy 5" is a hentai puzzle in which you need to move the elements vertically or horizontally to get the finished image.

name: Buck Bradley 2
description: Everything is useful Pick up anything you can find into your bag. You'll be surprised with how useful they can be. It will help you make new friends, avoid danger or simply get free stuff.

name: Martial Story
description: "Martial Story" - a 2D platformer runner with classic game mechanics: run on platforms, dodge enemies, throw swords, balance in free fall, test your reaction against hundreds of enemies, train your accuracy in jumping in caves.

name: Jade Order
description: Return from exile and restore the power balance of a secluded land. Play as an ancient warrior that has been tasked to light the sealed beacons of its millenary Order. Avoid the impending doom and complete 50 different puzzles as you aid the Jade Goddess.

name: City Things
description: City Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the city location within a certain time.

name: Dress Cake
description: Dress Cake cordially invites you to the Candy Kingdom Ball! Coralina has been waiting all her life for this event. When her Fairy Godmother answers the call, she reveals her wand has been broken. But Coralina won't be swayed! Take destiny into your own hands on a fantastical trip through Candy Kingdom to find the perfect, exquisite candy dress. Mouth-watering fashion awaits in Dress Cake!

name: Soppel
description: Soppel is a top down bullet-hell game by Faxdoc about descending a pit of trash and garbage. Fight mechs and robots in an attempt to find out what lies at the bottom.

name: Cave Buster
description: Underground action platformer with a silly alien.

name: Cool Game
description: Traditional roguelike where you build your team to defeat stronger and stronger opponents. Choose your teammates, their position and your opponents wisely, as one mistake can cost you the entire game

name: Splait Rage
description: Arm yourself with your trusty pistol and clear the unknown territory from enemies! Be careful, ammo is limited, there are many traps and evil enemies everywhere. Can you handle them in this unusual platformer/shooter hybrid?

name: Isolate Me!
description: An exciting survival game with roguelike elements in which you have to play as a police officer in a city engulfed by a pandemic, look for infected people and isolate them, manage the budget and hire police officers, set up vaccination centers and propaganda stands.

name: Search All: Bitcoin
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the bitcoins in a large location. Bitcoins will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Under Siege
description: "Under Siege" is a top-down arena shooter. The player takes on the role of a fearless tanker. The goal is to survive in the arena and defeat all enemies.

name: Guardener
description: Your garden is under attack! As a garden gnome, you grow and sell various vegetables to create an army. You'll pull out weeds, water plants and fight worms as you go through this year's seasons. Can you survive until winter?

name: We Are Not All Alone Unhappy
description: “We Are Not All Alone Unhappy” is a short interactive narrative piece made in Twine which interrogates the idea of the Shakespearean happy ending. It asks players to create a pairing between two characters who received canonically unhappy endings in Shakespeare’s plays.

name: Cartridge the Tiger
description: Cartridge the Tiger is a Super Nintendo inspired platformer with an in-game level editor, easy-to-use mod support using C#, and Steam Workshop integration.

name: Meg's Monster
description: Take control of the Underworld’s grumpiest ghoul to help a lost little girl find her way home in this creepy-cute indie adventure. Just be warned: if she cries, the whole world dies.

name: Russian Hunter
description: Russian Hunter is the most realistic hunting simulator you've ever seen!

name: Hentai Pussy 3
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Succubus Dating
description: What do you do when you find out your date is a succubus? Either run away or...

name: Estrus Princess
description: Estrus Princess is an exploratory RPG without combat. It's a story about a princess heading into estrus looking for a future king in the city.

name: Synthwave Fury
description: Speed and fight your way across an endless highway of neon lights and synthetic palm trees in this virtual world of pure retro '80s nostalgia.

name: Cricket Captain 2022
description: Cricket management goes to another level as Cricket Captain 2022 puts you in control. A major re-design of the player aggression system provides greater realism, coaching options and analysis. Limited over matches have been remodelled to give greater balance and reduce collapses.

name: Ashzel & The Power Dagger
description: Ashzel & The Power Dagger, is a Vampire Fantasy action-adventure RPG. Set in the Eerie, mysterious, dark, and sophisticated West Coast - a place where the Vampires of the West Coast are drawn into wonder, awe, and elegant drama.

name: Farm Defense
description: Farm Defense is a standalone game inspired by the Warcraft 3 mod ‘Random Farm’. Enjoy the nostalgic experience with new features and content. You are pitted against waves of increasingly difficult enemies in a Tower Defense environment. Mitigate the random elements to defend the farm. Conquer all 40 waves to live and fight another day.

name: Super Meteor
description: Can "Super Meteor" save the universe from the space debris created by the development of space by the people of Earth?

name: Awake
description: Awake is an isometric puzzle game about a young girl named Aya who is suffering from insomnia. Aya must navigate various obstacles in her path as she moves between different planes of consciousness. Join Aya on her journey to explore the depths of her dreamscape and uncover the root of her anxiety.

name: Realms
description: Welcome to Realms, a first-person shooter inspired by the rules and aesthetics of popular tabletop RPGs. Use The Die of Chaos along with your abilities and alternate gun fire to help Fortuna explore different realms and destroy any and all threats along the way.

name: Galactic Center for Etymological Research
description: You goal is to map out planets in different systems. You do so by receiving a word representing a name and swapping letters until you get other possible words with the same letters, which unlock upgrades or new locations.

name: The Lion's Beak, or Six Ways to Not Make a Videogame
description: A look at games unmade.

name: Aces & Adventures
description: Aces and Adventures is a deck builder RPG with poker-powered combat. Journey through a world inspired by Norse and Middle Eastern mythology to save the Life Tree from the evil that gnaws at her roots.

name: Escape from Tarkov: Arena
description:
Escape from Tarkov Arena is a standalone game project - a session-based multiplayer first-person shooter for PC with all the known and beloved hardcore game mechanics of Escape from Tarkov.
Players will take part in gladiatorial battles in various arenas of the city of Tarkov, organized by a mysterious group of Arena Masters led by the Host.

The game will feature various PvP and PvE game modes, ratings, weapon and gear unlocks and unique features for owners of the main Escape from Tarkov game, like the ability to play as your main profile character.

name: Mida's Adventure
description: Mida's Adventure is a puzzle-adventure game where a young lady named Mida searches underground for lost 80's and 90's technological artifacts. Jump into a low poly, low resolution, 2d billboard sprite world filled with dangerous obstacles.

name: Heroes of Time 2: Aizack's Return
description: This sequel is in the MV version. Totally revamped and faithful to the previous game made on VX Ace. Everything you experienced in the 1st and 2nd game is redone with MV graphics. In addition to the battle systems this time is sideview.

name: Hero of War
description: Hero of War is a platform game where every move must be very well thought out, wasting a single shot can put your entire mission at risk.

name: Starwalker: Into the Cylinder
description: Starwalker is an upcoming Survival-MMORPG taking place far into into the future in a space cylinder.

name: Evil's Den
description: Evil's Den: Forsaken Dungeon is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler featuring procedurally generated levels where you will battle through hordes of monsters to close a portal to Hell opened in the village's church.

name: 6-Mon Adventure
description: Embark on an adventure with 6-mon the little robot. Take control of the robot and travel through a disused factory, avoiding falls, protecting yourself from projectiles and traversing dangerous levels to stop the activities of a crazy AI.

name: The Walker
description: The Walker is a single-player survival horror game. Find out the truth behind what is happening while surviving the zombies. Feel the tension and fight your fear because they await you!

name: Psyolence
description: Psyolence is an arcade hardcore top-down slasher with neon graphics.

name: The Roots
description: In this game you gonna explore Townique.

name: Bug Butcher
description: Bug butcher is a roguelite action game with random locations, dynamic gameplay and tons of bugs.

name: Search All: Birds
description: A hidden object game in which you need to find all the birds in a large location. The birds will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Yuonger Adventure
description: A hardcore platformer for fans of challenging games. Your adventure will begin in an unknown man-made zone full of traps, electricity and magicians. Try to collect as many energy balls as possible and avoid falling into the clutches of enemies!

name: Doudas Danger
description: This unusual platformer will throw you into the thick of a hot skirmish in the depths of a magical forest! The undead, slugs and mimics rebelled and stole all the treasures of the forest - your task is to return them.

name: Chickweed
description: A strange creature has escaped from the lab... and that creature is you! Fight your way to freedom through hordes of enemies, dangerous traps and treacherous ambushes in this hardcore platformer and uncover the mystery of the running bush!

name: 2K20 Cuba
description: 2K20 Cuba is a modification of the 2012 MLB 2K game. Featuring all the teams that participate in the National Series of Cuban baseball and their respective updated rosters and stadiums.

name: Quickerflak_Ruthlessmod
description: Quickerflak_Ruthlessmod is the standalone "pretty hard" expansion of the retro-hardcore minigame Quickerflak.

name: Bionic Tadpole
description: A run-n-gun, non-stop action platformer-shooter! Pick up a weapon. A jetpack. A force shield. All while evading bullet-hell madness! Oh, and be mindful not to let your gun overheat...

name: Stellar Space
description: Stellar Space is a new take on a classic arcade game with a modern, rogue-like, form for new players to enjoy!

name: Yummy Girls
description: Sin descripción

name: 100 Hidden Turtles
description: Hidden object game in the undersea world setting. At first black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Then the game becomes colored. Animated fish and algae.

name: Lewd Life with My Doggy Wife
description: After getting kicked out of the hero's adventuring party and almost passing out on the side of the road, karma rewards you with a rescue from a passing doggirl! Put all that stressful "fighting for your life" behind you, kick back and take it easy with a lovey-dovey doggirl today!

name: PaperPlane
description: This is a small game that simulates the whereabouts of paper planes. Avoid obstacles by controlling the direction of falling and get high scores.

name: Geballer
description: In this mouse-only Bullet Hell, you create your own problems! Featuring unique and strange bullets, different gameplay modes, extreme secrets and even a level editor, Geballer wants to softly stimulate the reptilian part of your brain until you disappear completely.

name: Burrow of the Fallen Bear: A Gay Furry Visual Novel
description: A gay furry visual novel, full of fantasy and RPG elements. Experience Krile’s journey before he saves the Furry Heroes, Meet 3 unique hot adventurers, Fight with them, Buy items that impact your story, Unlock branches, Explore the Fallen Bear’s burrow. Everything through a classic choice system.

name: What Happened in Addison's Grotto
description:
A young woman from a small fishing village goes missing. Days later agents of an unknown organization find her, take her to a secret location. The young woman saw something she shouldn't have and now something else sees through her.

It needs to be found, isolated, and exorcised.

You're the only one who can do it.

name: Lysogenesis
description: You need to take the ship apart to put yourself together. Play as a seed of intelligence rapidly developing the ability to sense the world around you. Unfortunately the world you're trapped inside is crashed, and power is running low.

name: Knight of the Dead
description: In Knight of the Dead, the apocalypse is upon us. To run from the inevitable horde, one must consider their moves wisely, lest time, and the undead, catch up to them.

name: Shattered Memories
description:
This is a game made with Tomb Raider Level Editor. It uses the mechanics of Tomb Raider 2 while recreating its entire story.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2023.

name: Loretta
description:
Loretta is a psychological thriller that would make the player an accessory to the heroine’s crimes and would lead her through a self-crafted nightmare. This story is about a woman, dealing with betrayal, her husband’s infidelity, relationship problems and the difficult social situation of the 1940s.

Conceptually and aesthetically, the game is inspired by the American art of the twentieth century, the works of Andrew Wyeth and Edward Hopper, film noir of the 40s to 50s, thrillers by Alfred Hitchcock, the Philip Ridley movie The Reflecting Skin, the books 1922 by Stephen King and Lolita by Vladimir Nabokov.

name: Defrag Memories
description: The Networked Empathy Bank (tm) is a space where they upload and de-fragment the world's jumbled consciousness. Remna-Bot-2k finds and collates remnants and fragments of memory from across TNEBs archive zones, recreating person specific empathy archives. Its subject today is AG1970TQQ+. What does AG1970TQQ+ have to say about the different spaces and communities they occupy in their life and why are other Remna-bots trying to subvert this project?

name: Aleph: A Life
description: A browser-based art game made in response to Marwa Helal’s poem ")[[:”.’.,:]]( Remixed".

name: More Bones Than You Can Count
description: Explore a mysterious graveyard and its secrets before your time runs out. But be wary — not everything is as it seems.

name: gToons
description: gToons was an online card battle game available on the Cartoon Orbit website. The cards were themed after Cartoon Network shows and the game received five expansion packs. After a duration of lapsed management, Cartoon Orbit shut down, taking gToons down with it.

name: Touhou Kouma Daimeikyuu
description: A Touhou Doujin game based on Adventures of lolo series, developed by BansheeS Software.

name: Kishin Houkou Demonbane
description: Kishin Houkou Demonbane is a remake of Deus Machina Demonbane that makes numerous improvements to the original visual novel, such as full voice acting, lip flaps and blinking for sprites, more animated cutscenes, and a revised script, among other improvements. Unlike the original, this version does not contain any erotic content.

name: Touhou Rock Maiden 3: Houraisan Kaguya no Saigo!?
description: A Touhou Doujin game based on Rockman (Megaman), developed by Capricorn.

name: The Gramsby Summoning
description: Peek out the door and see what's stirring. Made for Two-Minute-Horror Jam.

name: Changkabang
description: Enter the bustling city of "New Bilsmando", filled with abstract wonders and critters as far as the eye can see. Unfortunately, it's not all wonderful for the "Chang Gang", a compact group of rookie hover-boarding rebels.

name: Touhou Rock Maiden FC 2: History's Greatest Sermon!!
description: A Touhou Doujin game based on Rockman (Megaman), developed by CAPRICORN.

name: HardCoin
description:
Earning money on stocks has never been easier and fun.
Jump on a time machine to earn as much money as you can.

name: Lullaby
description: It's Christmas Eve 1995 at the Scott's family residence, and something stirs from the darkest corners.

name: The Lion King Legeng
description: The Lion King Legeng is an unlicensed port of The Lion King game for SNES and Sega Genesis, released by Waixing in February 1997.

name: Super Lion King
description: Super Lion King is a Famicom port of Disney's The Lion King, originally made by Westwood for Sega Mega Drive, created by Super Game and published by Realtec at an unknown date (1995 or early 1996). It's also known to be Super Game's first port.
